name: Astora's Straight Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

Straight sword of an unknown knight,
likely one of Astora's superiors.

High-quality weapon with a powerful blessing.

name: Avelyn
desc:
Weapon type: Crossbow
Attack type: none

Repeating crossbow cherished by the weapon
craftsman Eidas. Its elaborate design makes
it closer to a work of art than a weapon.
Intricate mechanism makes heavy damage
possible through triple-shot firing of bolts,
but in fact each bolt inflicts less damage.

name: Balder Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Shield of the knights of the ancient kingdom
of Balder. Tweaked for improved stability.
Balder was the home of Knight King Rendal,
but the kingdom was reduced to ruins after
a widespread outbreak of Undead.

name: Balder Side Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

The knights of the ancient kingdom of Balder
wielded these rock-solid, long swords which
are excellent for thrust attacks.
Balder was the home of Knight King Rendal,
but the kingdom was reduced to ruins after
a widespread outbreak of Undead.

name: Bandit's Knife
desc:
Weapon type: Dagger
Attack type: Slash

This wide single-edged shortsword is
the favorite of lowly thieves and bandits.

Primarily a slicing weapon, but highly
effective when used for critical hits,
such as after parrying or from behind.

name: Barbed Straight Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Thrust

The choice weapon of the infamous Darkwraith
Kirk, also known as the Knight of Thorns for
the gnarly spikes on his favorite weapon.

This frightful sword deals only thrust
attacks, and causes heavy bleeding.

name: Bastard Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Greatsword
Attack type: Regular

This standard greatsword is normally wielded
with two hands due to its great weight.

Usually swung in large arcs and effective
against multiple foes. Far from ideal when
fighting in tight quarters.

name: Battle Axe
desc:
Weapon type: Axe
Attack type: Regular

Standard battle axe. Inflicts regular damage,
making it effective in various situations.
Powerful attack due to its weight, but one
wrong swing leaves the wielder wide open,
so timing and proximity to the enemy must
be judged carefully.

name: Beatrice's Catalyst
desc:
Weapon type: Catalyst
Attack type: Strike

Catalyst belonging to Beatrice, the rogue
witch. Contrasts with Vinheim catalysts.

This ancient catalyst shows signs of being
used for age-old sorceries. It has passed
the hands of many generations to get here.

name: Black Bow of Pharis
desc:
Weapon type: Bow
Attack type: none

The preferred black bow of the heroic
archer Pharis.

Has a longer range than standard bows,
but is more difficult to use. Without proper
abilities, results will be underwhelming.

name: Black Iron Greatshield
desc:
Weapon type: Greatshield
Attack type: Strike

Greatshield of the mighty knight Tarkus.

Built of special black iron and even heavier
than Knight Berenike's tower shield.
Especially resistant to fire attacks and
effective for shield bashing.

name: Black Knight Greataxe
desc:
Weapon type: Greataxe
Attack type: Regular

Greataxe of the black knights who wander
Lordran. Used to face chaos demons.

The large motion that puts the weight of the
body into the attack reflects the great size
of their adversaries long ago.

name: Black Knight Greatsword
desc:
Weapon type: Ultra Greatsword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

Greatsword of the black knights who wander
Lordran. Used to face chaos demons.

The large motion that puts the weight of the
body into the attack reflects the great size
of their adversaries long ago.

name: Black Knight Halberd
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Slash

Halberd of the black knights who wander
Lordran. Used to face chaos demons.

The large motion that puts the weight of the
body into the attack reflects the great size
of their adversaries long ago.

name: Black Knight Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Shield of the Black Knights that wander
Lordan. A flowing canal is chiseled deeply
into its face. 
Long ago, the black knights faced the chaos
demons, and were charred black, but their
shields became highly resistant to fire.

name: Black Knight Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Greatsword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

Greatsword of the black knights who wander
Lordran. Used to face chaos demons.

The large motion that puts the weight of the
body into the attack reflects the great size
of their adversaries long ago.

name: Blacksmith Giant Hammer
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Wooden hammer of the giant blacksmith in
Anor Londo who handles lightning weapons.

The giant blacksmith forges with this wooden
hammer, as it would be hazardous to handle
lightning weapons with metals.

name: Blacksmith Hammer
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Metal hammer of Andre of Astora,
blacksmith at the Old Church.

Can be used as a strike weapon, but better
left in the hands of its talented owner.

name: Bloodshield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

The bloodshield spoken of in the lost
legends. The red of blood is slightly
enchanted, and boosts various resistances.

name: Bonewheel Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Greatshield
Attack type: Strike

Giant wooden wheel encircled by spikes.
Half-melded to a strange skeleton.

Can be used as a greatshield, only for the
great gaps. But at least the spikes turn into
weapons with a good spin. Strange indeed!

name: Broadsword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular

The wide blade of this straight sword
emphasizes slicing and has no thrust attack.

The horizontal sweeping motion makes this
sword effective against multiple enemies.

name: Broken Straight Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

Half of the blade of this straight sword is
broken off.

Only the completely Hollowed would even
consider using this as a weapon.

name: Buckler
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Very small round metal shield.
Parry attacks with large center protrusion.

Small shields are always less stable, but
landing critical hits after parry is easier.
This shield is specialized for parrying.

name: Butcher Knife
desc:
Weapon type: Axe
Attack type: Regular

Giant butcher knife wielded by the Undead
man-eating cook lurking in the Depths.
More a tool for subduing and preparing live
catches than an actual weapon. Those who
have faced this deadly blade have a deeper
sense of how helpless prey must feel.

name: Caduceus Kite Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Medium metal shield.
Decorated by an ancient blue Caduceus.
A standard, widely-used shield.

name: Caduceus Round Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Round wooden shield crafted in Lordran.
Decorated by an ancient blue Caduceus.
The giant trees in Lordran are distant
offspring of the great stone archtrees.
This shield inherits their properties,
and the wood greatly reduces magic damage.

name: Caestus
desc:
Weapon type: Fists
Attack type: Strike

The weapon augments one's bare hands
with thick, studded leather.

The Caestus has a short reach, but quick
cool down. Amount of damage inflicted is
dependent on its wearer's strength.

name: Canvas Talisman
desc:
Weapon type: Talisman
Attack type: Strike

Medium for casting miracles of the Gods.
Canvas Talisman is for clerics on pilgrimage.

Equip talisman to cast miracles. 
Attune miracles from a scroll at a bonfire.
Most miracles have limited no. of uses.

name: Channeler's Trident
desc:
Weapon type: Spear
Attack type: Thrust

Trident of the Six-eyed Channelers,
sorcerers who serve Seath the Scaleless
in collecting human specimens.
Thrusted in circular motions in a unique
martial arts dance that stirs nearby allies
into a bloodthirsty frenzy.

name: Chaos Balder Side Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

The knights of the ancient kingdom of Balder
wielded these rock-solid, long swords which
are excellent for thrust attacks.
Balder was the home of Knight King Rendal,
but the kingdom was reduced to ruins after
a widespread outbreak of Undead.

name: Chaos Barbed Straight Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

The choice weapon of the infamous Darkwraith
Kirk, also known as the Knight of Thorns for
the gnarly spikes on his favorite weapon.

The sharp spikes of this ghastly weapon
cause heavy bleeding.

name: Chaos Bastard Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Greatsword
Attack type: Regular

This standard greatsword is normally wielded
with two hands due to its great weight.

Usually swung in large arcs and effective
against multiple foes. Far from ideal when
fighting in tight quarters.

name: Chaos Battle Axe
desc:
Weapon type: Axe
Attack type: Regular

Standard battle axe. Inflicts regular damage,
making it effective in various situations.
Powerful attack due to its weight, but one
wrong swing leaves the wielder wide open,
so timing and proximity to the enemy must
be judged carefully.

name: Chaos Black Bow of Pharis
desc:
Weapon type: Bow
Attack type: none

The preferred black bow of the heroic
archer Pharis.

Has a longer range than standard bows,
but is more difficult to use. Without proper
abilities, results will be underwhelming.

name: Chaos Blacksmith Hammer
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Metal hammer of Andre of Astora,
blacksmith at the Old Church.

Can be used as a strike weapon, but better
left in the hands of its talented owner.

name: Chaos Blade
desc:
Weapon type: Katana
Attack type: Slash

A curved sword born from the soul of
Quelaag, daughter of the Witch of Izalith,
who was transformed into a chaos demon.
This blade inherits only the chaotic nature
of Quelaag, and has a unique speckled design.
Blade wielder erodes along with opponents.

name: Chaos Blade
desc:
Weapon type: Katana
Attack type: Slash

A curved sword born from the soul of
Quelaag, daughter of the Witch of Izalith,
who was transformed into a chaos demon.
This blade inherits only the chaotic nature
of Quelaag, and has a unique speckled design.
Blade wielder erodes along with opponents.

name: Chaos Blade
desc:
Weapon type: Katana
Attack type: Slash

A curved sword born from the soul of
Quelaag, daughter of the Witch of Izalith,
who was transformed into a chaos demon.
This blade inherits only the chaotic nature
of Quelaag, and has a unique speckled design.
Blade wielder erodes along with opponents.

name: Chaos Broadsword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular

The wide blade of this straight sword
emphasizes slicing and has no thrust attack.

The horizontal sweeping motion makes this
sword effective against multiple enemies.

name: Chaos Broken Straight Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

Half of the blade of this straight sword is
broken off.

Only the completely Hollowed would even
consider using this as a weapon.

name: Chaos Butcher Knife
desc:
Weapon type: Axe
Attack type: Regular

Giant butcher knife wielded by the Undead
man-eating cook lurking in the Depths.
More a tool for subduing and preparing live
catches than an actual weapon. Those who
have faced this deadly blade have a deeper
sense of how helpless prey must feel.

name: Chaos Caestus
desc:
Weapon type: Fists
Attack type: Strike

The weapon augments one's bare hands
with thick, studded leather.

The Caestus has a short reach, but quick
cool down. Amount of damage inflicted is
dependent on its wearer's strength.

name: Chaos Claw
desc:
Weapon type: Fists
Attack type: Slash

A weapon formed by three sharp claws.

Attacks cause bleeding, and the wounds
inflicted are not easily mended. Preferred
weapon of the spooks of an Eastern land.

name: Chaos Claymore
desc:
Weapon type: Greatsword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

This larger type of greatsword is normally
wielded with two hands due to its weight.

This highly flexible greatsword can be used
to attack in swings or thrusts.

name: Chaos Club
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Strike

A simple wooden club.
This simple bladeless strike weapon is
effective against most foes, is easily
handled, and can break the guard of a shield.
However, a single miss makes one wide open,
so timing and proximities are crucial.

name: Chaos Composite Bow
desc:
Weapon type: Bow
Attack type: none

Composite bow emphasizing power.
Requires more strength than standard bows.

However, its range is shorter, making it
unfit for sniping.

name: Chaos Dagger
desc:
Weapon type: Dagger
Attack type: Slash/Thrust

This standard small dagger has only a modest
attack but can be jabbed in rapid succession,
and is effective in critical hits such as
after a parry or when stabbing in the back.
With both slash and thrust attacks, this
dagger is useful in various situations.

name: Chaos Darksword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular

The sword of the knights of the Four Kings of
New Londo. Its blade is wide and thick, and
it is wielded in an unusual manner.
When the Four Kings were seduced by evil,
their knights became Darkwraiths, servants
of the Dark who wielded these darkswords.

name: Chaos Demon Great Machete
desc:
Weapon type: Ultra Greatsword
Attack type: Regular

The lesser Capra demons use these greatswords
in pairs. The blade is cast iron and hooked.

The sword is imbued with no particular magic,
but for those who have the strength, its
great weight will smash foes mercilessly.

name: Chaos Demon's Great Hammer
desc:
Weapon type: Great Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Demon weapon built from the stone archtrees.
Used by lesser demons at North Undead Asylum.

This hammer is imbued with no special power,
but can merrily beat foes to a pulp,
providing you have the strength to wield it.

name: Chaos Demon's Greataxe
desc:
Weapon type: Greataxe
Attack type: Regular

Carved from the bones of fellow demons.
Wielded by the lesser Taurus demons.

This axe is imbued with no special power,
but can merrily beat foes to a pulp,
providing you have the strength to wield it.

name: Chaos Estoc
desc:
Weapon type: Thrusting Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

The largest of the thrusting swords.
Can pierce an armored knight in one thrust.

The blade is also sharp,
allowing slicing as well.

name: Chaos Falchion
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Sword
Attack type: Slash

Small curved sword. Each hit inflicts little
damage, but fluid chain attacks are deadly.

The falchion's sharp slashing attacks are
effective against cloth and flesh, but not
against metal armor or tough scales.

name: Chaos Flamberge
desc:
Weapon type: Greatsword
Attack type: Slash

This greatsword with an undulating blade is
the choice weapon of the slithering serpent
men of Sen's Fortress.

This weapon is designed to flay the skin and
causes heavy bleeding.

name: Chaos Gargoyle Tail Axe
desc:
Weapon type: Axe
Attack type: Regular

Sliced tail of the gargoyle guarding the
Bell of Awakening in the Undead Church.

Can be used as a bronze battle axe.
Bends dramatically during large attacks,
owing to its nature as a tail.

name: Chaos Gargoyle's Halberd
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Regular

Halberd of the gargoyle guarding the
Bell of Awakening in the Undead Church.

Perfectly standard bronze halberd
without any special power.

name: Chaos Great Club
desc:
Weapon type: Great Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Giant tree branch serves as a wooden club.
Smashes enemies from upside the head.

The leaping attack is a trademark of clubs,
and this giant club is no exception.

name: Chaos Great Scythe
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Slash

Weapon with a long curved blade. Converted
from a wheat-harvesting tool.

The magnificent sharp curved blade
instills fear in opponents. Perhaps it is
their survival instinct at work.

name: Chaos Greataxe
desc:
Weapon type: Greataxe
Attack type: Regular

This greataxe is a veritable mass of iron.
Its weight sends foes flying, but makes it
difficult to handle without inhuman strength.

Any miss makes one very vulnerable, as each
swing requires the full force of the body.

name: Chaos Greatsword
desc:
Weapon type: Ultra Greatsword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

One of the gigantic straight greatswords.

Very few have what it takes to wield this
incredibly heavy, damage-dealing monster.
A favorite of the Knights Berenike, known for
their heavy armor, and Black Iron Tarkus.

name: Chaos Halberd
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

Long-hilted weapon mixing spear and axe is
difficult to handle, requiring both strength
and dexterity. The Halberd has two elementary
attacks: spear-like thrusting and large
sweeping swings. However, one false swing
and the wielder is left wide open.

name: Chaos Hand Axe
desc:
Weapon type: Axe
Attack type: Regular

Small hand axe. Appears identical to a
lumberjack's tool, but has an ideal weight
and strength, and is easy to handle.
One wrong swing leaves the wielder wide
open, so timing and proximity to the enemy
must be judged carefully.

name: Chaos Iaito
desc:
Weapon type: Katana
Attack type: Slash

Katana forged in an Eastern land.
The Katana is drawn from the scabbard at
lightning speed, using an Iaijutsu technique.

Iaijutsu allows the wielder to charge
forward to swiftly cut down distant foes.

name: Chaos Knife
desc:
Weapon type: Dagger
Attack type: Slash

This wide single-edged shortsword is
the favorite of lowly thieves and bandits.

Primarily a slicing weapon, but highly
effective when used for critical hits,
such as after parrying or from behind.

name: Chaos Large Club
desc:
Weapon type: Great Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Large wooden club.

The giant Undead of Blighttown wield these
clubs, which became poisonous from the
influence of their surroundings.

name: Chaos Longbow
desc:
Weapon type: Bow
Attack type: none

Large bow. Projectile weapon for experienced
hunters. Equip arrows to use.

Hold bow and press <?platmsg@10002?> to aim.
Aim for heads of humanoid foes.
Press <?platmsg@10003?>/<?platmsg@10004?> to change type of arrows.

name: Chaos Longsword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

Widely-used standard straight sword, only
matched in ubiquity by the shortsword.

An accessible sword which inflicts consistent
regular damage and high slash damage, making
it applicable to a variety of situations.

name: Chaos Lucerne
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Thrust

Halberd with a large, hard beak-like
protrusion. Inflicts thrust damage.
Instead of thrusting like a spear, the
wielder of the Lucerne aims to club
the head with its hard beak.

name: Chaos Mace
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Iron hammer with a protrusive pommel.
Standard weapon for clerics.
This simple bladeless strike weapon is
effective against most foes, and can
break the guard of a shield. However,
one miss leaves one wide open.

name: Chaos Mail Breaker
desc:
Weapon type: Thrusting Sword
Attack type: Thrust

Standard small thrusting sword.
Unsharpened but pointed solid
shaft can pierce tough armor.

Can be thrust using the weight of one's body,
and is very effective for critical attacks.

name: Chaos Man-srp. Greatsword
desc:
Weapon type: Greatsword
Attack type: Regular

This single-bladed blood-stained greatsword
is the choice weapon of the slithering 
serpent men of Sen's Fortress.

An ordinary human will have great difficulty
swinging this heavy beast effectively.

name: Chaos Morning Star
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Hammer with sharp spikes on its pommel.
One of the more barbaric cleric weapons.

The effect of these spikes makes this
strike-based weapon also cause bleeding.

name: Chaos Murakumo
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Greatsword
Attack type: Slash

Giant curved sword forged using special
methods in an Eastern land.
This unparalleled weapon cuts like a Katana
but is heavier than a Nata machete.
Requires extreme strength, dexterity,
and stamina to wield.

name: Chaos Notched Whip
desc:
Weapon type: Whip
Attack type: Regular

Whip with sharp spikes.

Only slightly effective against armor and
tough scales, but quite formidable against
enemies with exposed skin.
Also causes heavy bleeding.

name: Chaos Parrying Dagger
desc:
Weapon type: Dagger
Attack type: Slash/Thrust

This dagger is useful after parrying and is
normally equipped in the left hand.

A favorite of the knights of Carim, who are
famous for fighting without a shield.

name: Chaos Partizan
desc:
Weapon type: Spear
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

Spear with blade attached to broad point.
Boasts long reach, and can slice.

The wide range of this spear makes it
adaptable to many situations. Its strength
lies in its length, but in cramped quarters,
this backfires, and slices ricochet off walls.

name: Chaos Pickaxe
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Thrust

Traditionally a mining tool, but the hard
cone on the pommel is effective in battle.

A downward swing of the Pickaxe can crush
stone; a human head would be an afterthought.

name: Chaos Pike
desc:
Weapon type: Long Spear
Attack type: Thrust

Long spear with a very long red hilt.
Traditionally used by groups of soldiers.
Specially designed for distance thrusting.
Has the longest range of the non-projectile
weapons, but its very length makes it
somewhat difficult to handle.

name: Chaos Ptg. Guardian Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Sword
Attack type: Slash

Curved sword of Anor Londo painting guards.
Unique shape with flat tip.
The guardians, who strike down those who
dare threaten the paintings, attack in a
continuous, circular dancing motion,
a technique passed down through generations.

name: Chaos Rapier
desc:
Weapon type: Thrusting Sword
Attack type: Thrust

Standard thrusting sword. Regular one-handed
attack can be delivered with shield held up.
Can parry with use of left hand.

Thrusting attacks pierce and are effective
against foes with hard exteriors, but the
wielder is left open to damage after a swing.

name: Chaos Reinforced Club
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Strike

A club with leather nailed to the pommel.
The burg Undead merchant proudly peddles
this club, but its reinforcement is shoddy.
Indeed, its attack is stronger, but the
club is no longer dependably sturdy.

name: Chaos Ricard's Rapier
desc:
Weapon type: Thrusting Sword
Attack type: Thrust

A rapier with intricate decorations. Chosen
weapon of the infamous Undead Prince Ricard.
Ricard's exploits are told in a monomyth.
He was born into royalty, but wandered the
lands in a fateful ill-conceived journey.
He became Undead, and disappeared up North.

name: Chaos Scimitar
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Sword
Attack type: Slash

Small curved sword. Each hit inflicts little
damage, but fluid chain attacks are deadly.

The scimitar's sharp slashing attacks are
effective against cloth and flesh, but not
against metal armor or tough scales.

name: Chaos Scythe
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Slash

Halberd with a large blade.
Scythe adjusted for battle.

Designed especially for slicing. However,
one false swing leaves one wide open.

name: Chaos Server
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Greatsword
Attack type: Slash

A curved greatsword used in a
mysterious ancient rite.

Imbued with a frightful heretical energy,
this sword restores HP with each hit.

name: Chaos Short Bow
desc:
Weapon type: Bow
Attack type: none

Small bow. Standard projectile weapon.
Equip arrows to use.

Hold bow and press <?platmsg@10002?> to aim.
Aim for heads of humanoid foes.
Press <?platmsg@10003?>/<?platmsg@10004?> to change type of arrows.

name: Chaos Shortsword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

This small straight sword is widely used,
to an extent only matched by the longsword.

An accessible sword which inflicts consistent
regular damage and high slash damage, making
it applicable to a variety of situations.

name: Chaos Shotel
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Sword
Attack type: Slash

Curved sword with sharply curved blade.

Created by Arstor, Earl of Carim.
Requires great skill to wield, but evades
shield defense to sneak in damage.

name: Chaos Spear
desc:
Weapon type: Spear
Attack type: Thrust

Standard spear used commonly by soldiers.
Long reach, and can be used with shield up.
Effective against hard exteriors, and can hit
for high damage at the right moment of an
enemy's swing. But the hit radius is small,
and it is easily blocked by shields.

name: Chaos Straight Sword Hilt
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

The hilt of this lost sword was found
discarded in the Undead Asylum.

Only slightly better than one's bare hands,
and not recommended for extensive use.
Be certain to find a replacement quickly.

name: Chaos Sunlight Str. Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

This standard longsword, belonging to Solaire
of Astora, is of high quality, is well-
forged, and has been kept in good repair.

Easy-to-use and dependable, but unlikely to
live up to its grandiose name.

name: Chaos Uchigatana
desc:
Weapon type: Katana
Attack type: Slash/Thrust

Katana forged in an Eastern land.
Known for its brisk slashing motions.

The Uchigatana cuts beautifully and causes
bleeding, but its blade is easily nicked.

name: Chaos Warpick
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Thrust

Hammer with a large beak-shaped pommel.
Originally a pickaxe; redesigned for battle.

This simple but deadly weapon hits heavily
with thrust damage, such that it easily
cracks metal armor.

name: Chaos Washing Pole
desc:
Weapon type: Katana
Attack type: Slash/Thrust

Katana forged in an Eastern land.
Very unusual specimen with a long blade.

The blade is extremely long,
but as a result, quite easily broken.

name: Chaos Whip
desc:
Weapon type: Whip
Attack type: Regular

Leather whip.
Not intended for battle.

Virtually ineffective against armor and tough
scales, but quite formidable against enemies
with exposed skin.

name: Chaos Winged Spear
desc:
Weapon type: Spear
Attack type: Thrust

A long-hilted spear with a barbed point.
Long reach, and can be used with shield up.
Effective against hard exteriors, and hits
for high damage at the right moment of an
enemy's swing. But the hit radius is small,
and it is easily blocked by shields.

name: Chaos Zweihander
desc:
Weapon type: Ultra Greatsword
Attack type: Regular

One of the gigantic straight greatswords.

As the name suggests, the Zweihander is held
with two hands, but its wielder must still be
inhumanly strong. It is this great weight
that sends foes flying when hit solidly.

name: Claw
desc:
Weapon type: Fists
Attack type: Slash

A weapon formed by three sharp claws.

Attacks cause bleeding, and the wounds
inflicted are not easily mended. Preferred
weapon of the spooks of an Eastern land.

name: Claymore
desc:
Weapon type: Greatsword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

This larger type of greatsword is normally
wielded with two hands due to its weight.

This highly flexible greatsword can be used
to attack in swings or thrusts.

name: Club
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Strike

A simple wooden club.
This simple bladeless strike weapon is
effective against most foes, is easily
handled, and can break the guard of a shield.
However, a single miss makes one wide open,
so timing and proximities are crucial.

name: Composite Bow
desc:
Weapon type: Bow
Attack type: none

Composite bow emphasizing power.
Requires more strength than standard bows.

However, its range is shorter, making it
unfit for sniping.

name: Cracked Round Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Round wooden shield.
Cracked and nearly broken.

Wood shields are lighter than metal shields,
but this one has lower physical damage
reduction stability, partly due to cracking.

name: Crescent Axe
desc:
Weapon type: Axe
Attack type: Regular

Well-used old bronze battle axe with a
long hilt and a crescent-shaped blade.

One of the blessed weapons of the Way of
White. The Crescent Axe is bequeathed to
cleric warriors who have proven their faith.

name: Crest Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Shield of a nameless knight, likely a
high-ranked knight of Astora.

One of the enchanted blue shields.
The Crest Shield greatly reduces
magic damage.

name: Crys. Barbed Str. Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

The choice weapon of the infamous Darkwraith
Kirk, also known as the Knight of Thorns for
the gnarly spikes on his favorite weapon.

The sharp spikes of this ghastly weapon
cause heavy bleeding.

name: Crys. Black Iron Grtshld.
desc:
Weapon type: Greatshield
Attack type: Strike

Greatshield of the mighty knight Tarkus.

Built of special black iron and even heavier
than Knight Berenike's tower shield.
Especially resistant to fire attacks and
effective for shield bashing.

name: Crys. Broken Str. Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

Half of the blade of this straight sword is
broken off.

Only the completely Hollowed would even
consider using this as a weapon.

name: Crys. Caduceus Kite Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Medium metal shield.
Decorated by an ancient blue Caduceus.
A standard, widely-used shield.

name: Crys. Caduceus Round Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Round wooden shield crafted in Lordran.
Decorated by an ancient blue Caduceus.
The giant trees in Lordran are distant
offspring of the great stone archtrees.
This shield inherits their properties,
and the wood greatly reduces magic damage.

name: Crys. Cracked Round Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Round wooden shield.
Cracked and nearly broken.

Wood shields are lighter than metal shields,
but this one has lower physical damage
reduction stability, partly due to cracking.

name: Crys. Demon's Great Hammer
desc:
Weapon type: Great Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Demon weapon built from the stone archtrees.
Used by lesser demons at North Undead Asylum.

This hammer is imbued with no special power,
but can merrily beat foes to a pulp,
providing you have the strength to wield it.

name: Crys. Hollow Soldier Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Metal shield wielded by Hollow soldiers.
Heavily rusted but sturdy, providing a
strong defense.

name: Crys. Large Leather Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Large, leather-covered round shield.
Choice shield for hunters.

Wood shields are lighter than metal shields,
but with lower physical damage reduction,
and reduced shield stability.

name: Crys. Man-srp. Greatsword
desc:
Weapon type: Greatsword
Attack type: Regular

This single-bladed blood-stained greatsword
is the choice weapon of the slithering 
serpent men of Sen's Fortress.

An ordinary human will have great difficulty
swinging this heavy beast effectively.

name: Crys. Ptg. Guardian Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Sword
Attack type: Slash

Curved sword of Anor Londo painting guards.
Unique shape with flat tip.
The guardians, who strike down those who
dare threaten the paintings, attack in a
continuous, circular dancing motion,
a technique passed down through generations.

name: Crys. Small Leather Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Small, leather-covered round shield,
reinforced in critical spots with metal.

Small shields are always less stable, but
landing critical hits after parry is easier.

name: Crys. Sunlight Str. Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

This standard longsword, belonging to Solaire
of Astora, is of high quality, is well-
forged, and has been kept in good repair.

Easy-to-use and dependable, but unlikely to
live up to its grandiose name.

name: Crys. Warrior's Rd. Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Round wooden shield crafted in Lordran.
Decorated with the ancient Labrys axe.
The giant trees in Lordran are distant
offspring of the great stone archtrees.
This shield inherits their properties, 
and the wood reduces magic damage.

name: Crystal Avelyn
desc:
Weapon type: Crossbow
Attack type: none

Repeating crossbow cherished by the weapon
craftsman Eidas. Its elaborate design makes
it closer to a work of art than a weapon.
Intricate mechanism makes heavy damage
possible through triple-shot firing of bolts,
but in fact each bolt inflicts less damage.

name: Crystal Balder Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Shield of the knights of the ancient kingdom
of Balder. Tweaked for improved stability.
Balder was the home of Knight King Rendal,
but the kingdom was reduced to ruins after
a widespread outbreak of Undead.

name: Crystal Balder Side Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

The knights of the ancient kingdom of Balder
wielded these rock-solid, long swords which
are excellent for thrust attacks.
Balder was the home of Knight King Rendal,
but the kingdom was reduced to ruins after
a widespread outbreak of Undead.

name: Crystal Bastard Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Greatsword
Attack type: Regular

This standard greatsword is normally wielded
with two hands due to its great weight.

Usually swung in large arcs and effective
against multiple foes. Far from ideal when
fighting in tight quarters.

name: Crystal Battle Axe
desc:
Weapon type: Axe
Attack type: Regular

Standard battle axe. Inflicts regular damage,
making it effective in various situations.
Powerful attack due to its weight, but one
wrong swing leaves the wielder wide open,
so timing and proximity to the enemy must
be judged carefully.

name: Crystal Black Bow of Pharis
desc:
Weapon type: Bow
Attack type: none

The preferred black bow of the heroic
archer Pharis.

Has a longer range than standard bows,
but is more difficult to use. Without proper
abilities, results will be underwhelming.

name: Crystal Blacksmith Hammer
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Metal hammer of Andre of Astora,
blacksmith at the Old Church.

Can be used as a strike weapon, but better
left in the hands of its talented owner.

name: Crystal Bloodshield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

The bloodshield spoken of in the lost
legends. The red of blood is slightly
enchanted, and boosts various resistances.

name: Crystal Bonewheel Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Greatshield
Attack type: Strike

Giant wooden wheel encircled by spikes.
Half-melded to a strange skeleton.

Can be used as a greatshield, only for the
great gaps. But at least the spikes turn into
weapons with a good spin. Strange indeed!

name: Crystal Broadsword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular

The wide blade of this straight sword
emphasizes slicing and has no thrust attack.

The horizontal sweeping motion makes this
sword effective against multiple enemies.

name: Crystal Buckler
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Very small round metal shield.
Parry attacks with large center protrusion.

Small shields are always less stable, but
landing critical hits after parry is easier.
This shield is specialized for parrying.

name: Crystal Butcher Knife
desc:
Weapon type: Axe
Attack type: Regular

Giant butcher knife wielded by the Undead
man-eating cook lurking in the Depths.
More a tool for subduing and preparing live
catches than an actual weapon. Those who
have faced this deadly blade have a deeper
sense of how helpless prey must feel.

name: Crystal Caestus
desc:
Weapon type: Fists
Attack type: Strike

The weapon augments one's bare hands
with thick, studded leather.

The Caestus has a short reach, but quick
cool down. Amount of damage inflicted is
dependent on its wearer's strength.

name: Crystal Claw
desc:
Weapon type: Fists
Attack type: Slash

A weapon formed by three sharp claws.

Attacks cause bleeding, and the wounds
inflicted are not easily mended. Preferred
weapon of the spooks of an Eastern land.

name: Crystal Claymore
desc:
Weapon type: Greatsword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

This larger type of greatsword is normally
wielded with two hands due to its weight.

This highly flexible greatsword can be used
to attack in swings or thrusts.

name: Crystal Club
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Strike

A simple wooden club.
This simple bladeless strike weapon is
effective against most foes, is easily
handled, and can break the guard of a shield.
However, a single miss makes one wide open,
so timing and proximities are crucial.

name: Crystal Composite Bow
desc:
Weapon type: Bow
Attack type: none

Composite bow emphasizing power.
Requires more strength than standard bows.

However, its range is shorter, making it
unfit for sniping.

name: Crystal Dagger
desc:
Weapon type: Dagger
Attack type: Slash/Thrust

This standard small dagger has only a modest
attack but can be jabbed in rapid succession,
and is effective in critical hits such as
after a parry or when stabbing in the back.
With both slash and thrust attacks, this
dagger is useful in various situations.

name: Crystal Darksword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular

The sword of the knights of the Four Kings of
New Londo. Its blade is wide and thick, and
it is wielded in an unusual manner.
When the Four Kings were seduced by evil,
their knights became Darkwraiths, servants
of the Dark who wielded these darkswords.

name: Crystal Demon Great Machete
desc:
Weapon type: Ultra Greatsword
Attack type: Regular

The lesser Capra demons use these greatswords
in pairs. The blade is cast iron and hooked.

The sword is imbued with no particular magic,
but for those who have the strength, its
great weight will smash foes mercilessly.

name: Crystal Demon's Greataxe
desc:
Weapon type: Greataxe
Attack type: Regular

Carved from the bones of fellow demons.
Wielded by the lesser Taurus demons.

This axe is imbued with no special power,
but can merrily beat foes to a pulp,
providing you have the strength to wield it.

name: Crystal Eagle Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Greatshield
Attack type: Strike

Greatshield with an eagle design. Lightest
and easiest greatshield to handle.

Greatshields are very stable, and deflect
attacks. But one cannot parry, and instead
bashes with the shield.

name: Crystal East-West Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Wooden shield.
Decorated with the ancient symbol of
a double-headed eagle, painted yellow.

Wood shields are lighter than metal shields,
but with lower physical damage reduction,
and reduced shield stability.

name: Crystal Effigy Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Frightful occult shield. Defends against
divine weapons and lightning.

In an ill-fated plot to destroy the very
gods, the followers of the occult once
attempted to steal the power of
Gravelord Nito, the first of the dead.

name: Crystal Estoc
desc:
Weapon type: Thrusting Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

The largest of the thrusting swords.
Can pierce an armored knight in one thrust.

The blade is also sharp,
allowing slicing as well.

name: Crystal Falchion
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Sword
Attack type: Slash

Small curved sword. Each hit inflicts little
damage, but fluid chain attacks are deadly.

The falchion's sharp slashing attacks are
effective against cloth and flesh, but not
against metal armor or tough scales.

name: Crystal Flamberge
desc:
Weapon type: Greatsword
Attack type: Slash

This greatsword with an undulating blade is
the choice weapon of the slithering serpent
men of Sen's Fortress.

This weapon is designed to flay the skin and
causes heavy bleeding.

name: Crystal Gargoyle Tail Axe
desc:
Weapon type: Axe
Attack type: Regular

Sliced tail of the gargoyle guarding the
Bell of Awakening in the Undead Church.

Can be used as a bronze battle axe.
Bends dramatically during large attacks,
owing to its nature as a tail.

name: Crystal Gargoyle's Halberd
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Regular

Halberd of the gargoyle guarding the
Bell of Awakening in the Undead Church.

Perfectly standard bronze halberd
without any special power.

name: Crystal Gargoyle's Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Bronze shield of the gargoyle guarding the
Bell of Awakening in the Undead Church.
The gargoyle's skin is tough by itself, and
perhaps its shield may have been a prop,
for it is a rare example of a metal shield
that does not reduce physical damage 100%.

name: Crystal Giant Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Greatshield
Attack type: Strike

Greatshield made of bronze and marcasite.
Used by giant sentinels of Anor Londo.
Marcasite, or white iron, is effective
against non-physical damage, but as the
shield is designed for the giant sentinels,
its weight is unbearable.

name: Crystal Grass Crest Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Old medium metal shield of unknown origin.
The grass crest is lightly imbued with magic,
which slightly speeds stamina recovery.

name: Crystal Great Club
desc:
Weapon type: Great Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Giant tree branch serves as a wooden club.
Smashes enemies from upside the head.

The leaping attack is a trademark of clubs,
and this giant club is no exception.

name: Crystal Great Scythe
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Slash

Weapon with a long curved blade. Converted
from a wheat-harvesting tool.

The magnificent sharp curved blade
instills fear in opponents. Perhaps it is
their survival instinct at work.

name: Crystal Greataxe
desc:
Weapon type: Greataxe
Attack type: Regular

This greataxe is a veritable mass of iron.
Its weight sends foes flying, but makes it
difficult to handle without inhuman strength.

Any miss makes one very vulnerable, as each
swing requires the full force of the body.

name: Crystal Greatsword
desc:
Weapon type: Greatsword
Attack type: Regular

A fully crystallized straight sword.
How such a weapon was created
is entirely unknown.
The crystallization boosts its attack, but
makes the blade brittle. The sword cannot be
used for long, as it cannot be repaired.

name: Crystal Greatsword
desc:
Weapon type: Ultra Greatsword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

One of the gigantic straight greatswords.

Very few have what it takes to wield this
incredibly heavy, damage-dealing monster.
A favorite of the Knights Berenike, known for
their heavy armor, and Black Iron Tarkus.

name: Crystal Halberd
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

Long-hilted weapon mixing spear and axe is
difficult to handle, requiring both strength
and dexterity. The Halberd has two elementary
attacks: spear-like thrusting and large
sweeping swings. However, one false swing
and the wielder is left wide open.

name: Crystal Hand Axe
desc:
Weapon type: Axe
Attack type: Regular

Small hand axe. Appears identical to a
lumberjack's tool, but has an ideal weight
and strength, and is easy to handle.
One wrong swing leaves the wielder wide
open, so timing and proximity to the enemy
must be judged carefully.

name: Crystal Heater Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Small metal shield.
A standard, widely-used shield.

This shield is easy to use, and is one of
the smallest shields that offers
100% physical damage reduction.

name: Crystal Heavy Crossbow
desc:
Weapon type: Crossbow
Attack type: none

Powerful large crossbow.
While bows require both hands, a crossbow is
held in one, but arming each bolt takes time.

Equip bolts to use.
Press <?platmsg@10003?>/<?platmsg@10004?> to change type of bolt.

name: Crystal Iaito
desc:
Weapon type: Katana
Attack type: Slash

Katana forged in an Eastern land.
The Katana is drawn from the scabbard at
lightning speed, using an Iaijutsu technique.

Iaijutsu allows the wielder to charge
forward to swiftly cut down distant foes.

name: Crystal Iron Round Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Thick iron shield of Shiva of the East.
Heaviest of the standard shields.
Deflects enemy attacks. A famous specimen
from Shiva's collection, but none who have
faced it have lived to tell the tale.

name: Crystal Knife
desc:
Weapon type: Dagger
Attack type: Slash

This wide single-edged shortsword is
the favorite of lowly thieves and bandits.

Primarily a slicing weapon, but highly
effective when used for critical hits,
such as after parrying or from behind.

name: Crystal Knight Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

This medium metal shield is elegantly
carved and painted.
Although it is thought to have been used by
ancient knights of the nobility, its defense
capabilities are similar to other shields.

name: Crystal Large Club
desc:
Weapon type: Great Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Large wooden club.

The giant Undead of Blighttown wield these
clubs, which became poisonous from the
influence of their surroundings.

name: Crystal Leather Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Round leather-covered shield.
A standard, widely-used shield.

Small shields are always less stable, but
landing critical hits after parry is easier.

name: Crystal Light Crossbow
desc:
Weapon type: Crossbow
Attack type: none

Standard crossbow issued to soldiers.
While bows require both hands, a crossbow is
held in one, but arming each bolt takes time.

Equip bolts to use.
Press <?platmsg@10003?>/<?platmsg@10004?> to change type of bolt.

name: Crystal Longbow
desc:
Weapon type: Bow
Attack type: none

Large bow. Projectile weapon for experienced
hunters. Equip arrows to use.

Hold bow and press <?platmsg@10002?> to aim.
Aim for heads of humanoid foes.
Press <?platmsg@10003?>/<?platmsg@10004?> to change type of arrows.

name: Crystal Longsword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

Widely-used standard straight sword, only
matched in ubiquity by the shortsword.

An accessible sword which inflicts consistent
regular damage and high slash damage, making
it applicable to a variety of situations.

name: Crystal Lucerne
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Thrust

Halberd with a large, hard beak-like
protrusion. Inflicts thrust damage.
Instead of thrusting like a spear, the
wielder of the Lucerne aims to club
the head with its hard beak.

name: Crystal Mace
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Iron hammer with a protrusive pommel.
Standard weapon for clerics.
This simple bladeless strike weapon is
effective against most foes, and can
break the guard of a shield. However,
one miss leaves one wide open.

name: Crystal Mail Breaker
desc:
Weapon type: Thrusting Sword
Attack type: Thrust

Standard small thrusting sword.
Unsharpened but pointed solid
shaft can pierce tough armor.

Can be thrust using the weight of one's body,
and is very effective for critical attacks.

name: Crystal Morning Star
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Hammer with sharp spikes on its pommel.
One of the more barbaric cleric weapons.

The effect of these spikes makes this
strike-based weapon also cause bleeding.

name: Crystal Murakumo
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Greatsword
Attack type: Slash

Giant curved sword forged using special
methods in an Eastern land.
This unparalleled weapon cuts like a Katana
but is heavier than a Nata machete.
Requires extreme strength, dexterity,
and stamina to wield.

name: Crystal Notched Whip
desc:
Weapon type: Whip
Attack type: Regular

Whip with sharp spikes.

Only slightly effective against armor and
tough scales, but quite formidable against
enemies with exposed skin.
Also causes heavy bleeding.

name: Crystal Parrying Dagger
desc:
Weapon type: Dagger
Attack type: Slash/Thrust

This dagger is useful after parrying and is
normally equipped in the left hand.

A favorite of the knights of Carim, who are
famous for fighting without a shield.

name: Crystal Partizan
desc:
Weapon type: Spear
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

Spear with blade attached to broad point.
Boasts long reach, and can slice.

The wide range of this spear makes it
adaptable to many situations. Its strength
lies in its length, but in cramped quarters,
this backfires, and slices ricochet off walls.

name: Crystal Pickaxe
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Thrust

Traditionally a mining tool, but the hard
cone on the pommel is effective in battle.

A downward swing of the Pickaxe can crush
stone; a human head would be an afterthought.

name: Crystal Pierce Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Thrust

Shield of certain knights of Catarina, used
in attacks with a large protrusion in center.

Can be used as a thrust weapon.

name: Crystal Pike
desc:
Weapon type: Long Spear
Attack type: Thrust

Long spear with a very long red hilt.
Traditionally used by groups of soldiers.
Specially designed for distance thrusting.
Has the longest range of the non-projectile
weapons, but its very length makes it
somewhat difficult to handle.

name: Crystal Plank Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Makeshift shield built from wood planks.
Provides minimal protection,
but at a cost of moderate humiliation.

name: Crystal R&W Round Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Round wooden shield crafted in Lordran
featuring an impressive red and white design.
The giant trees in Lordran are distant
offspring of the great stone archtrees.
This shield inherits their properties, and
the wood greatly reduces magic damage.

name: Crystal Rapier
desc:
Weapon type: Thrusting Sword
Attack type: Thrust

Standard thrusting sword. Regular one-handed
attack can be delivered with shield held up.
Can parry with use of left hand.

Thrusting attacks pierce and are effective
against foes with hard exteriors, but the
wielder is left open to damage after a swing.

name: Crystal Reinforced Club
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Strike

A club with leather nailed to the pommel.
The burg Undead merchant proudly peddles
this club, but its reinforcement is shoddy.
Indeed, its attack is stronger, but the
club is no longer dependably sturdy.

name: Crystal Ricard's Rapier
desc:
Weapon type: Thrusting Sword
Attack type: Thrust

A rapier with intricate decorations. Chosen
weapon of the infamous Undead Prince Ricard.
Ricard's exploits are told in a monomyth.
He was born into royalty, but wandered the
lands in a fateful ill-conceived journey.
He became Undead, and disappeared up North.

name: Crystal Ring Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Weapon born from the mystical creature of
the Darkroot Garden, the Moonlight Butterfly.
Imbued with a powerful crystal power, like
the butterfly created by Seath the Scaleless.
Can emit crystal light rings.

name: Crystal Sanctus
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

A legendary weapon of the Way of White,
granted to an Undead paladin long ago.

Once blessed with the protection of a white
flame, but its power has all but faded, so
that it provides only slight HP recovery.

name: Crystal Scimitar
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Sword
Attack type: Slash

Small curved sword. Each hit inflicts little
damage, but fluid chain attacks are deadly.

The scimitar's sharp slashing attacks are
effective against cloth and flesh, but not
against metal armor or tough scales.

name: Crystal Scythe
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Slash

Halberd with a large blade.
Scythe adjusted for battle.

Designed especially for slicing. However,
one false swing leaves one wide open.

name: Crystal Server
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Greatsword
Attack type: Slash

A curved greatsword used in a
mysterious ancient rite.

Imbued with a frightful occult energy
which restores HP with each hit.

name: Crystal Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

A fully crystallized straight shield.
How such a weapon was created
is entirely unknown.
The crystallization boosts its defense, but
makes the shield brittle. The shield cannot
be used for long, as it cannot be repaired.

name: Crystal Short Bow
desc:
Weapon type: Bow
Attack type: none

Small bow. Standard projectile weapon.
Equip arrows to use.

Hold bow and press <?platmsg@10002?> to aim.
Aim for heads of humanoid foes.
Press <?platmsg@10003?>/<?platmsg@10004?> to change type of arrows.

name: Crystal Shortsword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

This small straight sword is widely used,
to an extent only matched by the longsword.

An accessible sword which inflicts consistent
regular damage and high slash damage, making
it applicable to a variety of situations.

name: Crystal Shotel
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Sword
Attack type: Slash

Curved sword with sharply curved blade.

Created by Arstor, Earl of Carim.
Requires great skill to wield, but evades
shield defense to sneak in damage.

name: Crystal Sniper Crossbow
desc:
Weapon type: Crossbow
Attack type: none

Large crossbow with long distance used by
Carim snipers. Often used with sniper bolts.

But while crossbows are normally easy to
use, the Sniper Crossbow requires dexterity.

name: Crystal Spear
desc:
Weapon type: Spear
Attack type: Thrust

Standard spear used commonly by soldiers.
Long reach, and can be used with shield up.
Effective against hard exteriors, and can hit
for high damage at the right moment of an
enemy's swing. But the hit radius is small,
and it is easily blocked by shields.

name: Crystal Spider Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Shield of the savage mountain bandits.
Uniquely-shaped with a large black spider
etched upon it.
Has resistance to poison.

name: Crystal Spiked Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Shield of the infamous Darkwraith Kirk,
Knight of Thorns. Covered with spikes.

Can be used as a weapon.
Sharp spikes cause heavy bleeding.

name: Crystal Straight Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

A fully crystallized straight sword.
How such a weapon was created
is entirely unknown.
The crystallization boosts its attack, but
makes the blade brittle. The sword cannot be
used for long, as it cannot be repaired.

name: Crystal Straight Sword Hilt
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

The hilt of this lost sword was found
discarded in the Undead Asylum.

Only slightly better than one's bare hands,
and not recommended for extensive use.
Be certain to find a replacement quickly.

name: Crystal Sunlight Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Shield of Solaire of Astora, Knight of
Sunlight. Decorated with a holy symbol,
but Solaire illustrated it himself, and it
has no divine powers of its own. As it turns
out, Solaire's incredible prowess is a product
of his own training, and nothing more.

name: Crystal Target Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Small round metal shield.
Four protrusions used to parry attacks.

Small shields are always less stable, but
landing critical hits after parry is easier.
This shield is specialized for parrying.

name: Crystal Tower Kite Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Medium metal shield. Decorated with a tower,
the symbol of protection.
A standard, widely-used shield.

name: Crystal Tower Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Greatshield
Attack type: Strike

Metal greatshield. Used by Knight Berenike,
known for his heavy armor. This thick plate
of iron is heavily defensive but ultra heavy.
Greatshields are very stable, and deflect
attacks. However, one cannot parry,
and instead bashes with the shield.

name: Crystal Uchigatana
desc:
Weapon type: Katana
Attack type: Slash/Thrust

Katana forged in an Eastern land.
Known for its brisk slashing motions.

The Uchigatana cuts beautifully and causes
bleeding, but its blade is easily nicked.

name: Crystal Warpick
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Thrust

Hammer with a large beak-shaped pommel.
Originally a pickaxe; redesigned for battle.

This simple but deadly weapon hits heavily
with thrust damage, such that it easily
cracks metal armor.

name: Crystal Washing Pole
desc:
Weapon type: Katana
Attack type: Slash/Thrust

Katana forged in an Eastern land.
Very unusual specimen with a long blade.

The blade is extremely long,
but as a result, quite easily broken.

name: Crystal Whip
desc:
Weapon type: Whip
Attack type: Regular

Leather whip.
Not intended for battle.

Virtually ineffective against armor and tough
scales, but quite formidable against enemies
with exposed skin.

name: Crystal Winged Spear
desc:
Weapon type: Spear
Attack type: Thrust

A long-hilted spear with a barbed point.
Long reach, and can be used with shield up.
Effective against hard exteriors, and hits
for high damage at the right moment of an
enemy's swing. But the hit radius is small,
and it is easily blocked by shields.

name: Crystal Wooden Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Vertically elongated wooden shield.
Decorated with a white dragon.

Wood shields are lighter than metal shields,
but with lower physical damage reduction,
and reduced shield stability.

name: Crystal Zweihander
desc:
Weapon type: Ultra Greatsword
Attack type: Regular

One of the gigantic straight greatswords.

As the name suggests, the Zweihander is held
with two hands, but its wielder must still be
inhumanly strong. It is this great weight
that sends foes flying when hit solidly.

name: Dagger
desc:
Weapon type: Dagger
Attack type: Slash/Thrust

This standard small dagger has only a modest
attack but can be jabbed in rapid succession,
and is effective in critical hits such as
after a parry or when stabbing in the back.
With both slash and thrust attacks, this
dagger is useful in various situations.

name: Dark Hand
desc:
Weapon type: Fists
Attack type: Strike

The Darkwraiths, incited by Kaathe, use the
power of the dark soul to absorb humanity, an
art shared by this weapon, which also acts as
a special shield. The ancients, particularly,
could sap the humanity of even a replete
saint in the blink of an eye.

name: Darkmoon Bow
desc:
Weapon type: Bow
Attack type: none

Bow born from the soul of the Dark Sun
Gwyndolin, Darkmoon deity who watches over
the abandoned city of Gods, Anor Londo.

This golden bow is imbued with powerful magic
and is most impressive with Moonlight Arrows.

name: Darkmoon Talisman
desc:
Weapon type: Talisman
Attack type: Strike

Medium for casting miracles of the Gods.
Granted to Darkmoon Blade knights, adherents
to the Covenant of the Dark Sun Gwyndolin.
This talisman demands dutiful faith from its
owner, but has very high miracle adjustment.

name: Darksword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular

The sword of the knights of the Four Kings of
New Londo. Its blade is wide and thick, and
it is wielded in an unusual manner.
When the Four Kings were seduced by evil,
their knights became Darkwraiths, servants
of the Dark who wielded these darkswords.

name: Demon Great Machete
desc:
Weapon type: Ultra Greatsword
Attack type: Regular

The lesser Capra demons use these greatswords
in pairs. The blade is cast iron and hooked.

The sword is imbued with no particular magic,
but for those who have the strength, its
great weight will smash foes mercilessly.

name: Demon's Catalyst
desc:
Weapon type: Catalyst
Attack type: Thrust

Demon catalyst formed from Izalith molten
rock. Can be used as fire weapon.
The Demon Firesage was the first demon,
and the last master of the original fire
arts, before the Witch of Izalith was
engulfed by Chaos, creating pyromancy.

name: Demon's Great Hammer
desc:
Weapon type: Great Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Demon weapon built from the stone archtrees.
Used by lesser demons at North Undead Asylum.

This hammer is imbued with no special power,
but can merrily beat foes to a pulp,
providing you have the strength to wield it.

name: Demon's Greataxe
desc:
Weapon type: Greataxe
Attack type: Regular

Carved from the bones of fellow demons.
Wielded by the lesser Taurus demons.

This axe is imbued with no special power,
but can merrily beat foes to a pulp,
providing you have the strength to wield it.

name: Demon's Spear
desc:
Weapon type: Spear
Attack type: Thrust

Carved from the bones of fellow demons.
Wielded by the slim lesser Batwing demons.

The weapon of these chaos demons wandering
Anor Londo are different from those of other
chaos demons, and are imbued with lightning.

name: Div. Barbed Str. Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

The choice weapon of the infamous Darkwraith
Kirk, also known as the Knight of Thorns for
the gnarly spikes on his favorite weapon.

The sharp spikes of this ghastly weapon
cause heavy bleeding.

name: Div. Black Iron Greatshield
desc:
Weapon type: Greatshield
Attack type: Strike

Greatshield of the mighty knight Tarkus.

Built of special black iron and even heavier
than Knight Berenike's tower shield.
Especially resistant to fire attacks and
effective for shield bashing.

name: Div. Broken Str. Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

Half of the blade of this straight sword is
broken off.

Only the completely Hollowed would even
consider using this as a weapon.

name: Div. Caduceus Round Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Round wooden shield crafted in Lordran.
Decorated by an ancient blue Caduceus.
The giant trees in Lordran are distant
offspring of the great stone archtrees.
This shield inherits their properties,
and the wood greatly reduces magic damage.

name: Div. Demon's Gr. Hammer
desc:
Weapon type: Great Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Demon weapon built from the stone archtrees.
Used by lesser demons at North Undead Asylum.

This hammer is imbued with no special power,
but can merrily beat foes to a pulp,
providing you have the strength to wield it.

name: Div. Hollow Soldier Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Metal shield wielded by Hollow soldiers.
Heavily rusted but sturdy, providing a
strong defense.

name: Div. Man-srp. Greatsword
desc:
Weapon type: Greatsword
Attack type: Regular

This single-bladed blood-stained greatsword
is the choice weapon of the slithering 
serpent men of Sen's Fortress.

An ordinary human will have great difficulty
swinging this heavy beast effectively.

name: Div. Ptg. Guardian Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Sword
Attack type: Slash

Curved sword of Anor Londo painting guards.
Unique shape with flat tip.
The guardians, who strike down those who
dare threaten the paintings, attack in a
continuous, circular dancing motion,
a technique passed down through generations.

name: Div. Sunlight Str. Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

This standard longsword, belonging to Solaire
of Astora, is of high quality, is well-
forged, and has been kept in good repair.

Easy-to-use and dependable, but unlikely to
live up to its grandiose name.

name: Div. Warrior's Round Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Round wooden shield crafted in Lordran.
Decorated with the ancient Labrys axe.
The giant trees in Lordran are distant
offspring of the great stone archtrees.
This shield inherits their properties, 
and the wood reduces magic damage.

name: Divine Avelyn
desc:
Weapon type: Crossbow
Attack type: none

Repeating crossbow cherished by the weapon
craftsman Eidas. Its elaborate design makes
it closer to a work of art than a weapon.
Intricate mechanism makes heavy damage
possible through triple-shot firing of bolts,
but in fact each bolt inflicts less damage.

name: Divine Balder Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Shield of the knights of the ancient kingdom
of Balder. Tweaked for improved stability.
Balder was the home of Knight King Rendal,
but the kingdom was reduced to ruins after
a widespread outbreak of Undead.

name: Divine Balder Side Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

The knights of the ancient kingdom of Balder
wielded these rock-solid, long swords which
are excellent for thrust attacks.
Balder was the home of Knight King Rendal,
but the kingdom was reduced to ruins after
a widespread outbreak of Undead.

name: Divine Bastard Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Greatsword
Attack type: Regular

This standard greatsword is normally wielded
with two hands due to its great weight.

Usually swung in large arcs and effective
against multiple foes. Far from ideal when
fighting in tight quarters.

name: Divine Battle Axe
desc:
Weapon type: Axe
Attack type: Regular

Standard battle axe. Inflicts regular damage,
making it effective in various situations.
Powerful attack due to its weight, but one
wrong swing leaves the wielder wide open,
so timing and proximity to the enemy must
be judged carefully.

name: Divine Black Bow of Pharis
desc:
Weapon type: Bow
Attack type: none

The preferred black bow of the heroic
archer Pharis.

Has a longer range than standard bows,
but is more difficult to use. Without proper
abilities, results will be underwhelming.

name: Divine Blacksmith Hammer
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Metal hammer of Andre of Astora,
blacksmith at the Old Church.

Can be used as a strike weapon, but better
left in the hands of its talented owner.

name: Divine Bloodshield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

The bloodshield spoken of in the lost
legends. The red of blood is slightly
enchanted, and boosts various resistances.

name: Divine Bonewheel Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Greatshield
Attack type: Strike

Giant wooden wheel encircled by spikes.
Half-melded to a strange skeleton.

Can be used as a greatshield, only for the
great gaps. But at least the spikes turn into
weapons with a good spin. Strange indeed!

name: Divine Broadsword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular

The wide blade of this straight sword
emphasizes slicing and has no thrust attack.

The horizontal sweeping motion makes this
sword effective against multiple enemies.

name: Divine Buckler
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Very small round metal shield.
Parry attacks with large center protrusion.

Small shields are always less stable, but
landing critical hits after parry is easier.
This shield is specialized for parrying.

name: Divine Butcher Knife
desc:
Weapon type: Axe
Attack type: Regular

Giant butcher knife wielded by the Undead
man-eating cook lurking in the Depths.
More a tool for subduing and preparing live
catches than an actual weapon. Those who
have faced this deadly blade have a deeper
sense of how helpless prey must feel.

name: Divine Caduceus Kite Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Medium metal shield.
Decorated by an ancient blue Caduceus.
A standard, widely-used shield.

name: Divine Caestus
desc:
Weapon type: Fists
Attack type: Strike

The weapon augments one's bare hands
with thick, studded leather.

The Caestus has a short reach, but quick
cool down. Amount of damage inflicted is
dependent on its wearer's strength.

name: Divine Claw
desc:
Weapon type: Fists
Attack type: Slash

A weapon formed by three sharp claws.

Attacks cause bleeding, and the wounds
inflicted are not easily mended. Preferred
weapon of the spooks of an Eastern land.

name: Divine Claymore
desc:
Weapon type: Greatsword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

This larger type of greatsword is normally
wielded with two hands due to its weight.

This highly flexible greatsword can be used
to attack in swings or thrusts.

name: Divine Club
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Strike

A simple wooden club.
This simple bladeless strike weapon is
effective against most foes, is easily
handled, and can break the guard of a shield.
However, a single miss makes one wide open,
so timing and proximities are crucial.

name: Divine Composite Bow
desc:
Weapon type: Bow
Attack type: none

Composite bow emphasizing power.
Requires more strength than standard bows.

However, its range is shorter, making it
unfit for sniping.

name: Divine Cracked Round Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Round wooden shield.
Cracked and nearly broken.

Wood shields are lighter than metal shields,
but this one has lower physical damage
reduction stability, partly due to cracking.

name: Divine Dagger
desc:
Weapon type: Dagger
Attack type: Slash/Thrust

This standard small dagger has only a modest
attack but can be jabbed in rapid succession,
and is effective in critical hits such as
after a parry or when stabbing in the back.
With both slash and thrust attacks, this
dagger is useful in various situations.

name: Divine Darksword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular

The sword of the knights of the Four Kings of
New Londo. Its blade is wide and thick, and
it is wielded in an unusual manner.
When the Four Kings were seduced by evil,
their knights became Darkwraiths, servants
of the Dark who wielded these darkswords.

name: Divine Demon Great Machete
desc:
Weapon type: Ultra Greatsword
Attack type: Regular

The lesser Capra demons use these greatswords
in pairs. The blade is cast iron and hooked.

The sword is imbued with no particular magic,
but for those who have the strength, its
great weight will smash foes mercilessly.

name: Divine Demon's Greataxe
desc:
Weapon type: Greataxe
Attack type: Regular

Carved from the bones of fellow demons.
Wielded by the lesser Taurus demons.

This axe is imbued with no special power,
but can merrily beat foes to a pulp,
providing you have the strength to wield it.

name: Divine Eagle Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Greatshield
Attack type: Strike

Greatshield with an eagle design. Lightest
and easiest greatshield to handle.

Greatshields are very stable, and deflect
attacks. But one cannot parry, and instead
bashes with the shield.

name: Divine East-West Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Wooden shield.
Decorated with the ancient symbol of
a double-headed eagle, painted yellow.

Wood shields are lighter than metal shields,
but with lower physical damage reduction,
and reduced shield stability.

name: Divine Effigy Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Frightful occult shield. Defends against
divine weapons and lightning.

In an ill-fated plot to destroy the very
gods, the followers of the occult once
attempted to steal the power of
Gravelord Nito, the first of the dead.

name: Divine Estoc
desc:
Weapon type: Thrusting Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

The largest of the thrusting swords.
Can pierce an armored knight in one thrust.

The blade is also sharp,
allowing slicing as well.

name: Divine Falchion
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Sword
Attack type: Slash

Small curved sword. Each hit inflicts little
damage, but fluid chain attacks are deadly.

The falchion's sharp slashing attacks are
effective against cloth and flesh, but not
against metal armor or tough scales.

name: Divine Flamberge
desc:
Weapon type: Greatsword
Attack type: Slash

This greatsword with an undulating blade is
the choice weapon of the slithering serpent
men of Sen's Fortress.

This weapon is designed to flay the skin and
causes heavy bleeding.

name: Divine Gargoyle Tail Axe
desc:
Weapon type: Axe
Attack type: Regular

Sliced tail of the gargoyle guarding the
Bell of Awakening in the Undead Church.

Can be used as a bronze battle axe.
Bends dramatically during large attacks,
owing to its nature as a tail.

name: Divine Gargoyle's Halberd
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Regular

Halberd of the gargoyle guarding the
Bell of Awakening in the Undead Church.

Perfectly standard bronze halberd
without any special power.

name: Divine Gargoyle's Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Bronze shield of the gargoyle guarding the
Bell of Awakening in the Undead Church.
The gargoyle's skin is tough by itself, and
perhaps its shield may have been a prop,
for it is a rare example of a metal shield
that does not reduce physical damage 100%.

name: Divine Giant Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Greatshield
Attack type: Strike

Greatshield made of bronze and marcasite.
Used by giant sentinels of Anor Londo.
Marcasite, or white iron, is effective
against non-physical damage, but as the
shield is designed for the giant sentinels,
its weight is unbearable.

name: Divine Grass Crest Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Old medium metal shield of unknown origin.
The grass crest is lightly imbued with magic,
which slightly speeds stamina recovery.

name: Divine Great Club
desc:
Weapon type: Great Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Giant tree branch serves as a wooden club.
Smashes enemies from upside the head.

The leaping attack is a trademark of clubs,
and this giant club is no exception.

name: Divine Great Scythe
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Slash

Weapon with a long curved blade. Converted
from a wheat-harvesting tool.

The magnificent sharp curved blade
instills fear in opponents. Perhaps it is
their survival instinct at work.

name: Divine Greataxe
desc:
Weapon type: Greataxe
Attack type: Regular

This greataxe is a veritable mass of iron.
Its weight sends foes flying, but makes it
difficult to handle without inhuman strength.

Any miss makes one very vulnerable, as each
swing requires the full force of the body.

name: Divine Greatsword
desc:
Weapon type: Ultra Greatsword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

One of the gigantic straight greatswords.

Very few have what it takes to wield this
incredibly heavy, damage-dealing monster.
A favorite of the Knights Berenike, known for
their heavy armor, and Black Iron Tarkus.

name: Divine Halberd
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

Long-hilted weapon mixing spear and axe is
difficult to handle, requiring both strength
and dexterity. The Halberd has two elementary
attacks: spear-like thrusting and large
sweeping swings. However, one false swing
and the wielder is left wide open.

name: Divine Hand Axe
desc:
Weapon type: Axe
Attack type: Regular

Small hand axe. Appears identical to a
lumberjack's tool, but has an ideal weight
and strength, and is easy to handle.
One wrong swing leaves the wielder wide
open, so timing and proximity to the enemy
must be judged carefully.

name: Divine Heater Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Small metal shield.
A standard, widely-used shield.

This shield is easy to use, and is one of
the smallest shields that offers
100% physical damage reduction.

name: Divine Heavy Crossbow
desc:
Weapon type: Crossbow
Attack type: none

Powerful large crossbow.
While bows require both hands, a crossbow is
held in one, but arming each bolt takes time.

Equip bolts to use.
Press <?platmsg@10003?>/<?platmsg@10004?> to change type of bolt.

name: Divine Iaito
desc:
Weapon type: Katana
Attack type: Slash

Katana forged in an Eastern land.
The Katana is drawn from the scabbard at
lightning speed, using an Iaijutsu technique.

Iaijutsu allows the wielder to charge
forward to swiftly cut down distant foes.

name: Divine Iron Round Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Thick iron shield of Shiva of the East.
Heaviest of the standard shields.
Deflects enemy attacks. A famous specimen
from Shiva's collection, but none who have
faced it have lived to tell the tale.

name: Divine Knife
desc:
Weapon type: Dagger
Attack type: Slash

This wide single-edged shortsword is
the favorite of lowly thieves and bandits.

Primarily a slicing weapon, but highly
effective when used for critical hits,
such as after parrying or from behind.

name: Divine Knight Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

This medium metal shield is elegantly
carved and painted.
Although it is thought to have been used by
ancient knights of the nobility, its defense
capabilities are similar to other shields.

name: Divine Large Club
desc:
Weapon type: Great Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Large wooden club.

The giant Undead of Blighttown wield these
clubs, which became poisonous from the
influence of their surroundings.

name: Divine Large Leather Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Large, leather-covered round shield.
Choice shield for hunters.

Wood shields are lighter than metal shields,
but with lower physical damage reduction,
and reduced shield stability.

name: Divine Leather Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Round leather-covered shield.
A standard, widely-used shield.

Small shields are always less stable, but
landing critical hits after parry is easier.

name: Divine Light Crossbow
desc:
Weapon type: Crossbow
Attack type: none

Standard crossbow issued to soldiers.
While bows require both hands, a crossbow is
held in one, but arming each bolt takes time.

Equip bolts to use.
Press <?platmsg@10003?>/<?platmsg@10004?> to change type of bolt.

name: Divine Longbow
desc:
Weapon type: Bow
Attack type: none

Large bow. Projectile weapon for experienced
hunters. Equip arrows to use.

Hold bow and press <?platmsg@10002?> to aim.
Aim for heads of humanoid foes.
Press <?platmsg@10003?>/<?platmsg@10004?> to change type of arrows.

name: Divine Longsword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

Widely-used standard straight sword, only
matched in ubiquity by the shortsword.

An accessible sword which inflicts consistent
regular damage and high slash damage, making
it applicable to a variety of situations.

name: Divine Lucerne
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Thrust

Halberd with a large, hard beak-like
protrusion. Inflicts thrust damage.
Instead of thrusting like a spear, the
wielder of the Lucerne aims to club
the head with its hard beak.

name: Divine Mace
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Iron hammer with a protrusive pommel.
Standard weapon for clerics.
This simple bladeless strike weapon is
effective against most foes, and can
break the guard of a shield. However,
one miss leaves one wide open.

name: Divine Mail Breaker
desc:
Weapon type: Thrusting Sword
Attack type: Thrust

Standard small thrusting sword.
Unsharpened but pointed solid
shaft can pierce tough armor.

Can be thrust using the weight of one's body,
and is very effective for critical attacks.

name: Divine Morning Star
desc:
