Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Hammer with sharp spikes on its pommel.
One of the more barbaric cleric weapons.

The effect of these spikes makes this
strike-based weapon also cause bleeding.

name: Divine Murakumo
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Greatsword
Attack type: Slash

Giant curved sword forged using special
methods in an Eastern land.
This unparalleled weapon cuts like a Katana
but is heavier than a Nata machete.
Requires extreme strength, dexterity,
and stamina to wield.

name: Divine Notched Whip
desc:
Weapon type: Whip
Attack type: Regular

Whip with sharp spikes.

Only slightly effective against armor and
tough scales, but quite formidable against
enemies with exposed skin.
Also causes heavy bleeding.

name: Divine Parrying Dagger
desc:
Weapon type: Dagger
Attack type: Slash/Thrust

This dagger is useful after parrying and is
normally equipped in the left hand.

A favorite of the knights of Carim, who are
famous for fighting without a shield.

name: Divine Partizan
desc:
Weapon type: Spear
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

Spear with blade attached to broad point.
Boasts long reach, and can slice.

The wide range of this spear makes it
adaptable to many situations. Its strength
lies in its length, but in cramped quarters,
this backfires, and slices ricochet off walls.

name: Divine Pickaxe
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Thrust

Traditionally a mining tool, but the hard
cone on the pommel is effective in battle.

A downward swing of the Pickaxe can crush
stone; a human head would be an afterthought.

name: Divine Pierce Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Thrust

Shield of certain knights of Catarina, used
in attacks with a large protrusion in center.

Can be used as a thrust weapon.

name: Divine Pike
desc:
Weapon type: Long Spear
Attack type: Thrust

Long spear with a very long red hilt.
Traditionally used by groups of soldiers.
Specially designed for distance thrusting.
Has the longest range of the non-projectile
weapons, but its very length makes it
somewhat difficult to handle.

name: Divine Plank Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Makeshift shield built from wood planks.
Provides minimal protection,
but at a cost of moderate humiliation.

name: Divine R&W Round Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Round wooden shield crafted in Lordran
featuring an impressive red and white design.
The giant trees in Lordran are distant
offspring of the great stone archtrees.
This shield inherits their properties, and
the wood greatly reduces magic damage.

name: Divine Rapier
desc:
Weapon type: Thrusting Sword
Attack type: Thrust

Standard thrusting sword. Regular one-handed
attack can be delivered with shield held up.
Can parry with use of left hand.

Thrusting attacks pierce and are effective
against foes with hard exteriors, but the
wielder is left open to damage after a swing.

name: Divine Reinforced Club
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Strike

A club with leather nailed to the pommel.
The burg Undead merchant proudly peddles
this club, but its reinforcement is shoddy.
Indeed, its attack is stronger, but the
club is no longer dependably sturdy.

name: Divine Ricard's Rapier
desc:
Weapon type: Thrusting Sword
Attack type: Thrust

A rapier with intricate decorations. Chosen
weapon of the infamous Undead Prince Ricard.
Ricard's exploits are told in a monomyth.
He was born into royalty, but wandered the
lands in a fateful ill-conceived journey.
He became Undead, and disappeared up North.

name: Divine Sanctus
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

A legendary weapon of the Way of White,
granted to an Undead paladin long ago.

Once blessed with the protection of a white
flame, but its power has all but faded, so
that it provides only slight HP recovery.

name: Divine Scimitar
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Sword
Attack type: Slash

Small curved sword. Each hit inflicts little
damage, but fluid chain attacks are deadly.

The scimitar's sharp slashing attacks are
effective against cloth and flesh, but not
against metal armor or tough scales.

name: Divine Scythe
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Slash

Halberd with a large blade.
Scythe adjusted for battle.

Designed especially for slicing. However,
one false swing leaves one wide open.

name: Divine Server
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Greatsword
Attack type: Slash

A curved greatsword used in a
mysterious ancient rite.

Imbued with a frightful occult energy
which restores HP with each hit.

name: Divine Short Bow
desc:
Weapon type: Bow
Attack type: none

Small bow. Standard projectile weapon.
Equip arrows to use.

Hold bow and press <?platmsg@10002?> to aim.
Aim for heads of humanoid foes.
Press <?platmsg@10003?>/<?platmsg@10004?> to change type of arrows.

name: Divine Shortsword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

This small straight sword is widely used,
to an extent only matched by the longsword.

An accessible sword which inflicts consistent
regular damage and high slash damage, making
it applicable to a variety of situations.

name: Divine Shotel
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Sword
Attack type: Slash

Curved sword with sharply curved blade.

Created by Arstor, Earl of Carim.
Requires great skill to wield, but evades
shield defense to sneak in damage.

name: Divine Small Leather Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Small, leather-covered round shield,
reinforced in critical spots with metal.

Small shields are always less stable, but
landing critical hits after parry is easier.

name: Divine Sniper Crossbow
desc:
Weapon type: Crossbow
Attack type: none

Large crossbow with long distance used by
Carim snipers. Often used with sniper bolts.

But while crossbows are normally easy to
use, the Sniper Crossbow requires dexterity.

name: Divine Spear
desc:
Weapon type: Spear
Attack type: Thrust

Standard spear used commonly by soldiers.
Long reach, and can be used with shield up.
Effective against hard exteriors, and can hit
for high damage at the right moment of an
enemy's swing. But the hit radius is small,
and it is easily blocked by shields.

name: Divine Spider Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Shield of the savage mountain bandits.
Uniquely-shaped with a large black spider
etched upon it.
Has resistance to poison.

name: Divine Spiked Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Shield of the infamous Darkwraith Kirk,
Knight of Thorns. Covered with spikes.

Can be used as a weapon.
Sharp spikes cause heavy bleeding.

name: Divine Straight Sword Hilt
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

The hilt of this lost sword was found
discarded in the Undead Asylum.

Only slightly better than one's bare hands,
and not recommended for extensive use.
Be certain to find a replacement quickly.

name: Divine Sunlight Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Shield of Solaire of Astora, Knight of
Sunlight. Decorated with a holy symbol,
but Solaire illustrated it himself, and it
has no divine powers of its own. As it turns
out, Solaire's incredible prowess is a product
of his own training, and nothing more.

name: Divine Target Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Small round metal shield.
Four protrusions used to parry attacks.

Small shields are always less stable, but
landing critical hits after parry is easier.
This shield is specialized for parrying.

name: Divine Tower Kite Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Medium metal shield. Decorated with a tower,
the symbol of protection.
A standard, widely-used shield.

name: Divine Tower Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Greatshield
Attack type: Strike

Metal greatshield. Used by Knight Berenike,
known for his heavy armor. This thick plate
of iron is heavily defensive but ultra heavy.
Greatshields are very stable, and deflect
attacks. However, one cannot parry,
and instead bashes with the shield.

name: Divine Uchigatana
desc:
Weapon type: Katana
Attack type: Slash/Thrust

Katana forged in an Eastern land.
Known for its brisk slashing motions.

The Uchigatana cuts beautifully and causes
bleeding, but its blade is easily nicked.

name: Divine Warpick
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Thrust

Hammer with a large beak-shaped pommel.
Originally a pickaxe; redesigned for battle.

This simple but deadly weapon hits heavily
with thrust damage, such that it easily
cracks metal armor.

name: Divine Washing Pole
desc:
Weapon type: Katana
Attack type: Slash/Thrust

Katana forged in an Eastern land.
Very unusual specimen with a long blade.

The blade is extremely long,
but as a result, quite easily broken.

name: Divine Whip
desc:
Weapon type: Whip
Attack type: Regular

Leather whip.
Not intended for battle.

Virtually ineffective against armor and tough
scales, but quite formidable against enemies
with exposed skin.

name: Divine Winged Spear
desc:
Weapon type: Spear
Attack type: Thrust

A long-hilted spear with a barbed point.
Long reach, and can be used with shield up.
Effective against hard exteriors, and hits
for high damage at the right moment of an
enemy's swing. But the hit radius is small,
and it is easily blocked by shields.

name: Divine Wooden Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Vertically elongated wooden shield.
Decorated with a white dragon.

Wood shields are lighter than metal shields,
but with lower physical damage reduction,
and reduced shield stability.

name: Divine Zweihander
desc:
Weapon type: Ultra Greatsword
Attack type: Regular

One of the gigantic straight greatswords.

As the name suggests, the Zweihander is held
with two hands, but its wielder must still be
inhumanly strong. It is this great weight
that sends foes flying when hit solidly.

name: Dragon Bone Fist
desc:
Weapon type: Fists
Attack type: Strike

A weapon from the soul of the Iron Golem,
guardian of Sen's Fortress who repelled
countless heroes who sought Anor Londo.
The Gods fused the power of the soul with
the great bones of the dragons, forming an
appropriate core for the giant golem.

name: Dragon Crest Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Shield of a nameless knight, likely a
high-ranked knight of Astora.

One of the enchanted blue shields.
The Dragon Crest Shield greatly reduces
fire damage.

name: Dragon Greatsword
desc:
Weapon type: Ultra Greatsword
Attack type: Regular

This sword, one of the rare dragon weapons,
came from the tail of the stone dragon of
Ash Lake, descendant of the ancient dragons.

Its great mystical power will be unleashed
when wielded with two hands.

name: Dragon King Greataxe
desc:
Weapon type: Greataxe
Attack type: Regular

This axe, one of the rare dragon weapons,
is formed by the tail of the Gaping Dragon,
a distant, deformed descendant of the
everlasting dragons.
The axe is imbued with a mystical power,
to be released when held with both hands.

name: Dragon Tooth
desc:
Weapon type: Great Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Created from an everlasting dragon tooth.
Legendary great hammer of Havel the Rock.

The dragon tooth will never break as it is
harder than stone, and it grants its wielder
resistance to magic and flame.

name: Dragonslayer Greatbow
desc:
Weapon type: Greatbow
Attack type: none

Bow of the Dragonslayers, led by Hawkeye
Gough, one of Gwyn's Four Knights.

This bow's unusual size requires that it be
anchored to the ground when fired.
Only uses specialized great arrows.

name: Dragonslayer Spear
desc:
Weapon type: Spear
Attack type: Thrust

Cross spear born from the soul of Ornstein, a
Dragonslayer guarding Anor Londo cathedral.
Inflicts lightning damage; effective against
dragons. Two-handed thrust relies on cross
and buries spear deep within a dragon's hide,
and sends human foes flying.

name: Drake Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular

This sword, one of the rare dragon weapons,
is formed by a drake's tail. Drakes are
seen as undeveloped imitators of the dragons,
but in they are likely their distant kin.
The sword is imbued with a mystical power,
to be released when held with both hands.

name: Eagle Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Greatshield
Attack type: Strike

Greatshield with an eagle design. Lightest
and easiest greatshield to handle.

Greatshields are very stable, and deflect
attacks. But one cannot parry, and instead
bashes with the shield.

name: East-West Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Wooden shield.
Decorated with the ancient symbol of
a double-headed eagle, painted yellow.

Wood shields are lighter than metal shields,
but with lower physical damage reduction,
and reduced shield stability.

name: Effigy Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Frightful occult shield. Defends against
divine weapons and lightning.

In an ill-fated plot to destroy the very
gods, the followers of the occult once
attempted to steal the power of
Gravelord Nito, the first of the dead.

name: Ench. Barbed Str. Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

The choice weapon of the infamous Darkwraith
Kirk, also known as the Knight of Thorns for
the gnarly spikes on his favorite weapon.

The sharp spikes of this ghastly weapon
cause heavy bleeding.

name: Ench. Black Bow of Pharis
desc:
Weapon type: Bow
Attack type: none

The preferred black bow of the heroic
archer Pharis.

Has a longer range than standard bows,
but is more difficult to use. Without proper
abilities, results will be underwhelming.

name: Ench. Broken Str. Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

Half of the blade of this straight sword is
broken off.

Only the completely Hollowed would even
consider using this as a weapon.

name: Ench. Demon Great Machete
desc:
Weapon type: Ultra Greatsword
Attack type: Regular

The lesser Capra demons use these greatswords
in pairs. The blade is cast iron and hooked.

The sword is imbued with no particular magic,
but for those who have the strength, its
great weight will smash foes mercilessly.

name: Ench. Demon's Gr. Hammer
desc:
Weapon type: Great Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Demon weapon built from the stone archtrees.
Used by lesser demons at North Undead Asylum.

This hammer is imbued with no special power,
but can merrily beat foes to a pulp,
providing you have the strength to wield it.

name: Ench. Gargoyle's Halberd
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Regular

Halberd of the gargoyle guarding the
Bell of Awakening in the Undead Church.

Perfectly standard bronze halberd
without any special power.

name: Ench. Man-srp. Greatsword
desc:
Weapon type: Greatsword
Attack type: Regular

This single-bladed blood-stained greatsword
is the choice weapon of the slithering 
serpent men of Sen's Fortress.

An ordinary human will have great difficulty
swinging this heavy beast effectively.

name: Ench. Ptg. Guardian Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Sword
Attack type: Slash

Curved sword of Anor Londo painting guards.
Unique shape with flat tip.
The guardians, who strike down those who
dare threaten the paintings, attack in a
continuous, circular dancing motion,
a technique passed down through generations.

name: Ench. Straight Sword Hilt
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

The hilt of this lost sword was found
discarded in the Undead Asylum.

Only slightly better than one's bare hands,
and not recommended for extensive use.
Be certain to find a replacement quickly.

name: Ench. Sunlight Str. Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

This standard longsword, belonging to Solaire
of Astora, is of high quality, is well-
forged, and has been kept in good repair.

Easy-to-use and dependable, but unlikely to
live up to its grandiose name.

name: Enchanted Balder Side Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

The knights of the ancient kingdom of Balder
wielded these rock-solid, long swords which
are excellent for thrust attacks.
Balder was the home of Knight King Rendal,
but the kingdom was reduced to ruins after
a widespread outbreak of Undead.

name: Enchanted Bastard Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Greatsword
Attack type: Regular

This standard greatsword is normally wielded
with two hands due to its great weight.

Usually swung in large arcs and effective
against multiple foes. Far from ideal when
fighting in tight quarters.

name: Enchanted Battle Axe
desc:
Weapon type: Axe
Attack type: Regular

Standard battle axe. Inflicts regular damage,
making it effective in various situations.
Powerful attack due to its weight, but one
wrong swing leaves the wielder wide open,
so timing and proximity to the enemy must
be judged carefully.

name: Enchanted Blacksmith Hammer
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Metal hammer of Andre of Astora,
blacksmith at the Old Church.

Can be used as a strike weapon, but better
left in the hands of its talented owner.

name: Enchanted Broadsword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular

The wide blade of this straight sword
emphasizes slicing and has no thrust attack.

The horizontal sweeping motion makes this
sword effective against multiple enemies.

name: Enchanted Butcher Knife
desc:
Weapon type: Axe
Attack type: Regular

Giant butcher knife wielded by the Undead
man-eating cook lurking in the Depths.
More a tool for subduing and preparing live
catches than an actual weapon. Those who
have faced this deadly blade have a deeper
sense of how helpless prey must feel.

name: Enchanted Caestus
desc:
Weapon type: Fists
Attack type: Strike

The weapon augments one's bare hands
with thick, studded leather.

The Caestus has a short reach, but quick
cool down. Amount of damage inflicted is
dependent on its wearer's strength.

name: Enchanted Claw
desc:
Weapon type: Fists
Attack type: Slash

A weapon formed by three sharp claws.

Attacks cause bleeding, and the wounds
inflicted are not easily mended. Preferred
weapon of the spooks of an Eastern land.

name: Enchanted Claymore
desc:
Weapon type: Greatsword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

This larger type of greatsword is normally
wielded with two hands due to its weight.

This highly flexible greatsword can be used
to attack in swings or thrusts.

name: Enchanted Club
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Strike

A simple wooden club.
This simple bladeless strike weapon is
effective against most foes, is easily
handled, and can break the guard of a shield.
However, a single miss makes one wide open,
so timing and proximities are crucial.

name: Enchanted Composite Bow
desc:
Weapon type: Bow
Attack type: none

Composite bow emphasizing power.
Requires more strength than standard bows.

However, its range is shorter, making it
unfit for sniping.

name: Enchanted Dagger
desc:
Weapon type: Dagger
Attack type: Slash/Thrust

This standard small dagger has only a modest
attack but can be jabbed in rapid succession,
and is effective in critical hits such as
after a parry or when stabbing in the back.
With both slash and thrust attacks, this
dagger is useful in various situations.

name: Enchanted Darksword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular

The sword of the knights of the Four Kings of
New Londo. Its blade is wide and thick, and
it is wielded in an unusual manner.
When the Four Kings were seduced by evil,
their knights became Darkwraiths, servants
of the Dark who wielded these darkswords.

name: Enchanted Demon's Greataxe
desc:
Weapon type: Greataxe
Attack type: Regular

Carved from the bones of fellow demons.
Wielded by the lesser Taurus demons.

This axe is imbued with no special power,
but can merrily beat foes to a pulp,
providing you have the strength to wield it.

name: Enchanted Estoc
desc:
Weapon type: Thrusting Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

The largest of the thrusting swords.
Can pierce an armored knight in one thrust.

The blade is also sharp,
allowing slicing as well.

name: Enchanted Falchion
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Sword
Attack type: Slash

Small curved sword. Each hit inflicts little
damage, but fluid chain attacks are deadly.

The falchion's sharp slashing attacks are
effective against cloth and flesh, but not
against metal armor or tough scales.

name: Enchanted Flamberge
desc:
Weapon type: Greatsword
Attack type: Slash

This greatsword with an undulating blade is
the choice weapon of the slithering serpent
men of Sen's Fortress.

This weapon is designed to flay the skin and
causes heavy bleeding.

name: Enchanted Gargoyle Tail Axe
desc:
Weapon type: Axe
Attack type: Regular

Sliced tail of the gargoyle guarding the
Bell of Awakening in the Undead Church.

Can be used as a bronze battle axe.
Bends dramatically during large attacks,
owing to its nature as a tail.

name: Enchanted Great Club
desc:
Weapon type: Great Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Giant tree branch serves as a wooden club.
Smashes enemies from upside the head.

The leaping attack is a trademark of clubs,
and this giant club is no exception.

name: Enchanted Great Scythe
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Slash

Weapon with a long curved blade. Converted
from a wheat-harvesting tool.

The magnificent sharp curved blade
instills fear in opponents. Perhaps it is
their survival instinct at work.

name: Enchanted Greataxe
desc:
Weapon type: Greataxe
Attack type: Regular

This greataxe is a veritable mass of iron.
Its weight sends foes flying, but makes it
difficult to handle without inhuman strength.

Any miss makes one very vulnerable, as each
swing requires the full force of the body.

name: Enchanted Greatsword
desc:
Weapon type: Ultra Greatsword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

One of the gigantic straight greatswords.

Very few have what it takes to wield this
incredibly heavy, damage-dealing monster.
A favorite of the Knights Berenike, known for
their heavy armor, and Black Iron Tarkus.

name: Enchanted Halberd
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

Long-hilted weapon mixing spear and axe is
difficult to handle, requiring both strength
and dexterity. The Halberd has two elementary
attacks: spear-like thrusting and large
sweeping swings. However, one false swing
and the wielder is left wide open.

name: Enchanted Hand Axe
desc:
Weapon type: Axe
Attack type: Regular

Small hand axe. Appears identical to a
lumberjack's tool, but has an ideal weight
and strength, and is easy to handle.
One wrong swing leaves the wielder wide
open, so timing and proximity to the enemy
must be judged carefully.

name: Enchanted Iaito
desc:
Weapon type: Katana
Attack type: Slash

Katana forged in an Eastern land.
The Katana is drawn from the scabbard at
lightning speed, using an Iaijutsu technique.

Iaijutsu allows the wielder to charge
forward to swiftly cut down distant foes.

name: Enchanted Knife
desc:
Weapon type: Dagger
Attack type: Slash

This wide single-edged shortsword is
the favorite of lowly thieves and bandits.

Primarily a slicing weapon, but highly
effective when used for critical hits,
such as after parrying or from behind.

name: Enchanted Large Club
desc:
Weapon type: Great Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Large wooden club.

The giant Undead of Blighttown wield these
clubs, which became poisonous from the
influence of their surroundings.

name: Enchanted Longbow
desc:
Weapon type: Bow
Attack type: none

Large bow. Projectile weapon for experienced
hunters. Equip arrows to use.

Hold bow and press <?platmsg@10002?> to aim.
Aim for heads of humanoid foes.
Press <?platmsg@10003?>/<?platmsg@10004?> to change type of arrows.

name: Enchanted Longsword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

Widely-used standard straight sword, only
matched in ubiquity by the shortsword.

An accessible sword which inflicts consistent
regular damage and high slash damage, making
it applicable to a variety of situations.

name: Enchanted Lucerne
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Thrust

Halberd with a large, hard beak-like
protrusion. Inflicts thrust damage.
Instead of thrusting like a spear, the
wielder of the Lucerne aims to club
the head with its hard beak.

name: Enchanted Mace
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Iron hammer with a protrusive pommel.
Standard weapon for clerics.
This simple bladeless strike weapon is
effective against most foes, and can
break the guard of a shield. However,
one miss leaves one wide open.

name: Enchanted Mail Breaker
desc:
Weapon type: Thrusting Sword
Attack type: Thrust

Standard small thrusting sword.
Unsharpened but pointed solid
shaft can pierce tough armor.

Can be thrust using the weight of one's body,
and is very effective for critical attacks.

name: Enchanted Morning Star
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Hammer with sharp spikes on its pommel.
One of the more barbaric cleric weapons.

The effect of these spikes makes this
strike-based weapon also cause bleeding.

name: Enchanted Murakumo
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Greatsword
Attack type: Slash

Giant curved sword forged using special
methods in an Eastern land.
This unparalleled weapon cuts like a Katana
but is heavier than a Nata machete.
Requires extreme strength, dexterity,
and stamina to wield.

name: Enchanted Notched Whip
desc:
Weapon type: Whip
Attack type: Regular

Whip with sharp spikes.

Only slightly effective against armor and
tough scales, but quite formidable against
enemies with exposed skin.
Also causes heavy bleeding.

name: Enchanted Parrying Dagger
desc:
Weapon type: Dagger
Attack type: Slash/Thrust

This dagger is useful after parrying and is
normally equipped in the left hand.

A favorite of the knights of Carim, who are
famous for fighting without a shield.

name: Enchanted Partizan
desc:
Weapon type: Spear
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

Spear with blade attached to broad point.
Boasts long reach, and can slice.

The wide range of this spear makes it
adaptable to many situations. Its strength
lies in its length, but in cramped quarters,
this backfires, and slices ricochet off walls.

name: Enchanted Pickaxe
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Thrust

Traditionally a mining tool, but the hard
cone on the pommel is effective in battle.

A downward swing of the Pickaxe can crush
stone; a human head would be an afterthought.

name: Enchanted Pike
desc:
Weapon type: Long Spear
Attack type: Thrust

Long spear with a very long red hilt.
Traditionally used by groups of soldiers.
Specially designed for distance thrusting.
Has the longest range of the non-projectile
weapons, but its very length makes it
somewhat difficult to handle.

name: Enchanted Rapier
desc:
Weapon type: Thrusting Sword
Attack type: Thrust

Standard thrusting sword. Regular one-handed
attack can be delivered with shield held up.
Can parry with use of left hand.

Thrusting attacks pierce and are effective
against foes with hard exteriors, but the
wielder is left open to damage after a swing.

name: Enchanted Reinforced Club
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Strike

A club with leather nailed to the pommel.
The burg Undead merchant proudly peddles
this club, but its reinforcement is shoddy.
Indeed, its attack is stronger, but the
club is no longer dependably sturdy.

name: Enchanted Ricard's Rapier
desc:
Weapon type: Thrusting Sword
Attack type: Thrust

A rapier with intricate decorations. Chosen
weapon of the infamous Undead Prince Ricard.
Ricard's exploits are told in a monomyth.
He was born into royalty, but wandered the
lands in a fateful ill-conceived journey.
He became Undead, and disappeared up North.

name: Enchanted Scimitar
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Sword
Attack type: Slash

Small curved sword. Each hit inflicts little
damage, but fluid chain attacks are deadly.

The scimitar's sharp slashing attacks are
effective against cloth and flesh, but not
against metal armor or tough scales.

name: Enchanted Scythe
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Slash

Halberd with a large blade.
Scythe adjusted for battle.

Designed especially for slicing. However,
one false swing leaves one wide open.

name: Enchanted Server
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Greatsword
Attack type: Slash

A curved greatsword used in a
mysterious ancient rite.

Imbued with a frightful occult energy
which restores HP with each hit.

name: Enchanted Short Bow
desc:
Weapon type: Bow
Attack type: none

Small bow. Standard projectile weapon.
Equip arrows to use.

Hold bow and press <?platmsg@10002?> to aim.
Aim for heads of humanoid foes.
Press <?platmsg@10003?>/<?platmsg@10004?> to change type of arrows.

name: Enchanted Shortsword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

This small straight sword is widely used,
to an extent only matched by the longsword.

An accessible sword which inflicts consistent
regular damage and high slash damage, making
it applicable to a variety of situations.

name: Enchanted Shotel
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Sword
Attack type: Slash

Curved sword with sharply curved blade.

Created by Arstor, Earl of Carim.
Requires great skill to wield, but evades
shield defense to sneak in damage.

name: Enchanted Spear
desc:
Weapon type: Spear
Attack type: Thrust

Standard spear used commonly by soldiers.
Long reach, and can be used with shield up.
Effective against hard exteriors, and can hit
for high damage at the right moment of an
enemy's swing. But the hit radius is small,
and it is easily blocked by shields.

name: Enchanted Uchigatana
desc:
Weapon type: Katana
Attack type: Slash/Thrust

Katana forged in an Eastern land.
Known for its brisk slashing motions.

The Uchigatana cuts beautifully and causes
bleeding, but its blade is easily nicked.

name: Enchanted Warpick
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Thrust

Hammer with a large beak-shaped pommel.
Originally a pickaxe; redesigned for battle.

This simple but deadly weapon hits heavily
with thrust damage, such that it easily
cracks metal armor.

name: Enchanted Washing Pole
desc:
Weapon type: Katana
Attack type: Slash/Thrust

Katana forged in an Eastern land.
Very unusual specimen with a long blade.

The blade is extremely long,
but as a result, quite easily broken.

name: Enchanted Whip
desc:
Weapon type: Whip
Attack type: Regular

Leather whip.
Not intended for battle.

Virtually ineffective against armor and tough
scales, but quite formidable against enemies
with exposed skin.

name: Enchanted Winged Spear
desc:
Weapon type: Spear
Attack type: Thrust

A long-hilted spear with a barbed point.
Long reach, and can be used with shield up.
Effective against hard exteriors, and hits
for high damage at the right moment of an
enemy's swing. But the hit radius is small,
and it is easily blocked by shields.

name: Enchanted Zweihander
desc:
Weapon type: Ultra Greatsword
Attack type: Regular

One of the gigantic straight greatswords.

As the name suggests, the Zweihander is held
with two hands, but its wielder must still be
inhumanly strong. It is this great weight
that sends foes flying when hit solidly.

name: Estoc
desc:
Weapon type: Thrusting Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

The largest of the thrusting swords.
Can pierce an armored knight in one thrust.

The blade is also sharp,
allowing slicing as well.

name: Falchion
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Sword
Attack type: Slash

Small curved sword. Each hit inflicts little
damage, but fluid chain attacks are deadly.

The falchion's sharp slashing attacks are
effective against cloth and flesh, but not
against metal armor or tough scales.

name: Fire Avelyn
desc:
Weapon type: Crossbow
Attack type: none

Repeating crossbow cherished by the weapon
craftsman Eidas. Its elaborate design makes
it closer to a work of art than a weapon.
Intricate mechanism makes heavy damage
possible through triple-shot firing of bolts,
but in fact each bolt inflicts less damage.

name: Fire Balder Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Shield of the knights of the ancient kingdom
of Balder. Tweaked for improved stability.
Balder was the home of Knight King Rendal,
but the kingdom was reduced to ruins after
a widespread outbreak of Undead.

name: Fire Balder Side Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

The knights of the ancient kingdom of Balder
wielded these rock-solid, long swords which
are excellent for thrust attacks.
Balder was the home of Knight King Rendal,
but the kingdom was reduced to ruins after
a widespread outbreak of Undead.

name: Fire Barbed Straight Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

The choice weapon of the infamous Darkwraith
Kirk, also known as the Knight of Thorns for
the gnarly spikes on his favorite weapon.

The sharp spikes of this ghastly weapon
cause heavy bleeding.

name: Fire Bastard Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Greatsword
Attack type: Regular

This standard greatsword is normally wielded
with two hands due to its great weight.

Usually swung in large arcs and effective
against multiple foes. Far from ideal when
fighting in tight quarters.

name: Fire Battle Axe
desc:
Weapon type: Axe
Attack type: Regular

Standard battle axe. Inflicts regular damage,
making it effective in various situations.
Powerful attack due to its weight, but one
wrong swing leaves the wielder wide open,
so timing and proximity to the enemy must
be judged carefully.

name: Fire Black Bow of Pharis
desc:
Weapon type: Bow
Attack type: none

The preferred black bow of the heroic
archer Pharis.

Has a longer range than standard bows,
but is more difficult to use. Without proper
abilities, results will be underwhelming.

name: Fire Black Iron Greatshield
desc:
Weapon type: Greatshield
Attack type: Strike

Greatshield of the mighty knight Tarkus.

Built of special black iron and even heavier
than Knight Berenike's tower shield.
Especially resistant to fire attacks and
effective for shield bashing.

name: Fire Blacksmith Hammer
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Metal hammer of Andre of Astora,
blacksmith at the Old Church.

Can be used as a strike weapon, but better
left in the hands of its talented owner.

name: Fire Bloodshield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

The bloodshield spoken of in the lost
legends. The red of blood is slightly
enchanted, and boosts various resistances.

name: Fire Bonewheel Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Greatshield
Attack type: Strike

Giant wooden wheel encircled by spikes.
Half-melded to a strange skeleton.

Can be used as a greatshield, only for the
great gaps. But at least the spikes turn into
weapons with a good spin. Strange indeed!

name: Fire Broadsword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular

The wide blade of this straight sword
emphasizes slicing and has no thrust attack.

The horizontal sweeping motion makes this
sword effective against multiple enemies.

name: Fire Broken Straight Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

Half of the blade of this straight sword is
broken off.

Only the completely Hollowed would even
consider using this as a weapon.

name: Fire Buckler
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Very small round metal shield.
Parry attacks with large center protrusion.

Small shields are always less stable, but
landing critical hits after parry is easier.
This shield is specialized for parrying.

name: Fire Butcher Knife
desc:
Weapon type: Axe
Attack type: Regular

Giant butcher knife wielded by the Undead
man-eating cook lurking in the Depths.
More a tool for subduing and preparing live
catches than an actual weapon. Those who
have faced this deadly blade have a deeper
sense of how helpless prey must feel.

name: Fire Caduceus Kite Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Medium metal shield.
Decorated by an ancient blue Caduceus.
A standard, widely-used shield.

name: Fire Caduceus Round Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Round wooden shield crafted in Lordran.
Decorated by an ancient blue Caduceus.
The giant trees in Lordran are distant
offspring of the great stone archtrees.
This shield inherits their properties,
and the wood greatly reduces magic damage.

name: Fire Caestus
desc:
Weapon type: Fists
Attack type: Strike

The weapon augments one's bare hands
with thick, studded leather.

The Caestus has a short reach, but quick
cool down. Amount of damage inflicted is
dependent on its wearer's strength.

name: Fire Claw
desc:
Weapon type: Fists
Attack type: Slash

A weapon formed by three sharp claws.

Attacks cause bleeding, and the wounds
inflicted are not easily mended. Preferred
weapon of the spooks of an Eastern land.

name: Fire Claymore
desc:
Weapon type: Greatsword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

This larger type of greatsword is normally
wielded with two hands due to its weight.

This highly flexible greatsword can be used
to attack in swings or thrusts.

name: Fire Club
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Strike

A simple wooden club.
This simple bladeless strike weapon is
effective against most foes, is easily
handled, and can break the guard of a shield.
However, a single miss makes one wide open,
so timing and proximities are crucial.

name: Fire Composite Bow
desc:
Weapon type: Bow
Attack type: none

Composite bow emphasizing power.
Requires more strength than standard bows.

However, its range is shorter, making it
unfit for sniping.

name: Fire Cracked Round Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Round wooden shield.
Cracked and nearly broken.

Wood shields are lighter than metal shields,
but this one has lower physical damage
reduction stability, partly due to cracking.

name: Fire Dagger
desc:
Weapon type: Dagger
Attack type: Slash/Thrust

This standard small dagger has only a modest
attack but can be jabbed in rapid succession,
and is effective in critical hits such as
after a parry or when stabbing in the back.
With both slash and thrust attacks, this
dagger is useful in various situations.

name: Fire Darksword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular

The sword of the knights of the Four Kings of
New Londo. Its blade is wide and thick, and
it is wielded in an unusual manner.
When the Four Kings were seduced by evil,
their knights became Darkwraiths, servants
of the Dark who wielded these darkswords.

name: Fire Demon Great Machete
desc:
Weapon type: Ultra Greatsword
Attack type: Regular

The lesser Capra demons use these greatswords
in pairs. The blade is cast iron and hooked.

The sword is imbued with no particular magic,
but for those who have the strength, its
great weight will smash foes mercilessly.

name: Fire Demon's Great Hammer
desc:
Weapon type: Great Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Demon weapon built from the stone archtrees.
Used by lesser demons at North Undead Asylum.

This hammer is imbued with no special power,
but can merrily beat foes to a pulp,
providing you have the strength to wield it.

name: Fire Demon's Greataxe
desc:
Weapon type: Greataxe
Attack type: Regular

Carved from the bones of fellow demons.
Wielded by the lesser Taurus demons.

This axe is imbued with no special power,
but can merrily beat foes to a pulp,
providing you have the strength to wield it.

name: Fire Eagle Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Greatshield
Attack type: Strike

Greatshield with an eagle design. Lightest
and easiest greatshield to handle.

Greatshields are very stable, and deflect
attacks. But one cannot parry, and instead
bashes with the shield.

name: Fire East-West Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Wooden shield.
Decorated with the ancient symbol of
a double-headed eagle, painted yellow.

Wood shields are lighter than metal shields,
but with lower physical damage reduction,
and reduced shield stability.

name: Fire Effigy Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Frightful occult shield. Defends against
divine weapons and lightning.

In an ill-fated plot to destroy the very
gods, the followers of the occult once
attempted to steal the power of
Gravelord Nito, the first of the dead.

name: Fire Estoc
desc:
Weapon type: Thrusting Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

The largest of the thrusting swords.
Can pierce an armored knight in one thrust.

The blade is also sharp,
allowing slicing as well.

name: Fire Falchion
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Sword
Attack type: Slash

Small curved sword. Each hit inflicts little
damage, but fluid chain attacks are deadly.

The falchion's sharp slashing attacks are
effective against cloth and flesh, but not
against metal armor or tough scales.

name: Fire Flamberge
desc:
Weapon type: Greatsword
Attack type: Slash

This greatsword with an undulating blade is
the choice weapon of the slithering serpent
men of Sen's Fortress.

This weapon is designed to flay the skin and
causes heavy bleeding.

name: Fire Gargoyle Tail Axe
desc:
Weapon type: Axe
Attack type: Regular

Sliced tail of the gargoyle guarding the
Bell of Awakening in the Undead Church.

Can be used as a bronze battle axe.
Bends dramatically during large attacks,
owing to its nature as a tail.

name: Fire Gargoyle's Halberd
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Regular

Halberd of the gargoyle guarding the
Bell of Awakening in the Undead Church.

Perfectly standard bronze halberd
without any special power.

name: Fire Gargoyle's Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Bronze shield of the gargoyle guarding the
Bell of Awakening in the Undead Church.
The gargoyle's skin is tough by itself, and
perhaps its shield may have been a prop,
for it is a rare example of a metal shield
that does not reduce physical damage 100%.

name: Fire Giant Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Greatshield
Attack type: Strike

Greatshield made of bronze and marcasite.
Used by giant sentinels of Anor Londo.
Marcasite, or white iron, is effective
against non-physical damage, but as the
shield is designed for the giant sentinels,
its weight is unbearable.

name: Fire Grass Crest Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Old medium metal shield of unknown origin.
The grass crest is lightly imbued with magic,
which slightly speeds stamina recovery.

name: Fire Great Club
desc:
Weapon type: Great Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Giant tree branch serves as a wooden club.
Smashes enemies from upside the head.

The leaping attack is a trademark of clubs,
and this giant club is no exception.

name: Fire Great Scythe
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Slash

Weapon with a long curved blade. Converted
from a wheat-harvesting tool.

The magnificent sharp curved blade
instills fear in opponents. Perhaps it is
their survival instinct at work.

name: Fire Greataxe
desc:
Weapon type: Greataxe
Attack type: Regular

This greataxe is a veritable mass of iron.
Its weight sends foes flying, but makes it
difficult to handle without inhuman strength.

Any miss makes one very vulnerable, as each
swing requires the full force of the body.

name: Fire Greatsword
desc:
Weapon type: Ultra Greatsword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

One of the gigantic straight greatswords.

Very few have what it takes to wield this
incredibly heavy, damage-dealing monster.
A favorite of the Knights Berenike, known for
their heavy armor, and Black Iron Tarkus.

name: Fire Halberd
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

Long-hilted weapon mixing spear and axe is
difficult to handle, requiring both strength
and dexterity. The Halberd has two elementary
attacks: spear-like thrusting and large
sweeping swings. However, one false swing
and the wielder is left wide open.

name: Fire Hand Axe
desc:
Weapon type: Axe
Attack type: Regular

Small hand axe. Appears identical to a
lumberjack's tool, but has an ideal weight
and strength, and is easy to handle.
One wrong swing leaves the wielder wide
open, so timing and proximity to the enemy
must be judged carefully.

name: Fire Heater Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Small metal shield.
A standard, widely-used shield.

This shield is easy to use, and is one of
the smallest shields that offers
100% physical damage reduction.

name: Fire Heavy Crossbow
desc:
Weapon type: Crossbow
Attack type: none

Powerful large crossbow.
While bows require both hands, a crossbow is
held in one, but arming each bolt takes time.

Equip bolts to use.
Press <?platmsg@10003?>/<?platmsg@10004?> to change type of bolt.

name: Fire Hollow Soldier Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Metal shield wielded by Hollow soldiers.
Heavily rusted but sturdy, providing a
strong defense.

name: Fire Iaito
desc:
Weapon type: Katana
Attack type: Slash

Katana forged in an Eastern land.
The Katana is drawn from the scabbard at
lightning speed, using an Iaijutsu technique.

Iaijutsu allows the wielder to charge
forward to swiftly cut down distant foes.

name: Fire Iron Round Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Thick iron shield of Shiva of the East.
Heaviest of the standard shields.
Deflects enemy attacks. A famous specimen
from Shiva's collection, but none who have
faced it have lived to tell the tale.

name: Fire Knife
desc:
Weapon type: Dagger
Attack type: Slash

This wide single-edged shortsword is
the favorite of lowly thieves and bandits.

Primarily a slicing weapon, but highly
effective when used for critical hits,
such as after parrying or from behind.

name: Fire Knight Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

This medium metal shield is elegantly
carved and painted.
Although it is thought to have been used by
ancient knights of the nobility, its defense
capabilities are similar to other shields.

name: Fire Large Club
desc:
Weapon type: Great Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Large wooden club.

The giant Undead of Blighttown wield these
clubs, which became poisonous from the
influence of their surroundings.

name: Fire Large Leather Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Large, leather-covered round shield.
Choice shield for hunters.

Wood shields are lighter than metal shields,
but with lower physical damage reduction,
and reduced shield stability.

name: Fire Leather Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Round leather-covered shield.
A standard, widely-used shield.

Small shields are always less stable, but
landing critical hits after parry is easier.

name: Fire Light Crossbow
desc:
Weapon type: Crossbow
Attack type: none

Standard crossbow issued to soldiers.
While bows require both hands, a crossbow is
held in one, but arming each bolt takes time.

Equip bolts to use.
Press <?platmsg@10003?>/<?platmsg@10004?> to change type of bolt.

name: Fire Longbow
desc:
Weapon type: Bow
Attack type: none

Large bow. Projectile weapon for experienced
hunters. Equip arrows to use.

Hold bow and press <?platmsg@10002?> to aim.
Aim for heads of humanoid foes.
Press <?platmsg@10003?>/<?platmsg@10004?> to change type of arrows.

name: Fire Longsword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

Widely-used standard straight sword, only
matched in ubiquity by the shortsword.

An accessible sword which inflicts consistent
regular damage and high slash damage, making
it applicable to a variety of situations.

name: Fire Lucerne
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Thrust

Halberd with a large, hard beak-like
protrusion. Inflicts thrust damage.
Instead of thrusting like a spear, the
wielder of the Lucerne aims to club
the head with its hard beak.

name: Fire Mace
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Iron hammer with a protrusive pommel.
Standard weapon for clerics.
This simple bladeless strike weapon is
effective against most foes, and can
break the guard of a shield. However,
one miss leaves one wide open.

name: Fire Mail Breaker
desc:
Weapon type: Thrusting Sword
Attack type: Thrust

Standard small thrusting sword.
Unsharpened but pointed solid
shaft can pierce tough armor.

Can be thrust using the weight of one's body,
and is very effective for critical attacks.

name: Fire Man-serpent Greatsword
desc:
Weapon type: Greatsword
Attack type: Regular

This single-bladed blood-stained greatsword
is the choice weapon of the slithering 
serpent men of Sen's Fortress.

An ordinary human will have great difficulty
swinging this heavy beast effectively.

name: Fire Morning Star
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Hammer with sharp spikes on its pommel.
One of the more barbaric cleric weapons.

The effect of these spikes makes this
strike-based weapon also cause bleeding.

name: Fire Murakumo
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Greatsword
Attack type: Slash

Giant curved sword forged using special
methods in an Eastern land.
This unparalleled weapon cuts like a Katana
but is heavier than a Nata machete.
Requires extreme strength, dexterity,
and stamina to wield.

name: Fire Notched Whip
desc:
Weapon type: Whip
Attack type: Regular

Whip with sharp spikes.

Only slightly effective against armor and
tough scales, but quite formidable against
enemies with exposed skin.
Also causes heavy bleeding.

name: Fire Parrying Dagger
desc:
Weapon type: Dagger
Attack type: Slash/Thrust

This dagger is useful after parrying and is
normally equipped in the left hand.

A favorite of the knights of Carim, who are
famous for fighting without a shield.

name: Fire Partizan
desc:
Weapon type: Spear
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

Spear with blade attached to broad point.
Boasts long reach, and can slice.

The wide range of this spear makes it
adaptable to many situations. Its strength
lies in its length, but in cramped quarters,
this backfires, and slices ricochet off walls.

name: Fire Pickaxe
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Thrust

Traditionally a mining tool, but the hard
cone on the pommel is effective in battle.

A downward swing of the Pickaxe can crush
stone; a human head would be an afterthought.

name: Fire Pierce Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Thrust

Shield of certain knights of Catarina, used
in attacks with a large protrusion in center.

Can be used as a thrust weapon.

name: Fire Pike
desc:
Weapon type: Long Spear
Attack type: Thrust

Long spear with a very long red hilt.
Traditionally used by groups of soldiers.
Specially designed for distance thrusting.
Has the longest range of the non-projectile
weapons, but its very length makes it
somewhat difficult to handle.

name: Fire Plank Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Makeshift shield built from wood planks.
Provides minimal protection,
but at a cost of moderate humiliation.

name: Fire Ptg. Guardian Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Sword
Attack type: Slash

Curved sword of Anor Londo painting guards.
Unique shape with flat tip.
The guardians, who strike down those who
dare threaten the paintings, attack in a
continuous, circular dancing motion,
a technique passed down through generations.

name: Fire R&W Round Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Round wooden shield crafted in Lordran
featuring an impressive red and white design.
The giant trees in Lordran are distant
offspring of the great stone archtrees.
This shield inherits their properties, and
the wood greatly reduces magic damage.

name: Fire Rapier
desc:
Weapon type: Thrusting Sword
Attack type: Thrust

Standard thrusting sword. Regular one-handed
attack can be delivered with shield held up.
Can parry with use of left hand.

Thrusting attacks pierce and are effective
against foes with hard exteriors, but the
wielder is left open to damage after a swing.

name: Fire Reinforced Club
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Strike

A club with leather nailed to the pommel.
The burg Undead merchant proudly peddles
this club, but its reinforcement is shoddy.
Indeed, its attack is stronger, but the
club is no longer dependably sturdy.

name: Fire Ricard's Rapier
desc:
Weapon type: Thrusting Sword
Attack type: Thrust

A rapier with intricate decorations. Chosen
weapon of the infamous Undead Prince Ricard.
Ricard's exploits are told in a monomyth.
He was born into royalty, but wandered the
lands in a fateful ill-conceived journey.
He became Undead, and disappeared up North.

name: Fire Sanctus
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

A legendary weapon of the Way of White,
granted to an Undead paladin long ago.

Once blessed with the protection of a white
flame, but its power has all but faded, so
that it provides only slight HP recovery.

name: Fire Scimitar
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Sword
Attack type: Slash

Small curved sword. Each hit inflicts little
damage, but fluid chain attacks are deadly.

The scimitar's sharp slashing attacks are
effective against cloth and flesh, but not
against metal armor or tough scales.

name: Fire Scythe
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Slash

Halberd with a large blade.
Scythe adjusted for battle.

Designed especially for slicing. However,
one false swing leaves one wide open.

name: Fire Server
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Greatsword
Attack type: Slash

A curved greatsword used in a
mysterious ancient rite.

Imbued with a frightful heretical energy,
this sword restores HP with each hit.

name: Fire Short Bow
desc:
Weapon type: Bow
Attack type: none

Small bow. Standard projectile weapon.
Equip arrows to use.

Hold bow and press <?platmsg@10002?> to aim.
Aim for heads of humanoid foes.
Press <?platmsg@10003?>/<?platmsg@10004?> to change type of arrows.

name: Fire Shortsword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

This small straight sword is widely used,
to an extent only matched by the longsword.

An accessible sword which inflicts consistent
regular damage and high slash damage, making
it applicable to a variety of situations.

name: Fire Shotel
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Sword
Attack type: Slash

Curved sword with sharply curved blade.

Created by Arstor, Earl of Carim.
Requires great skill to wield, but evades
shield defense to sneak in damage.

name: Fire Small Leather Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Small, leather-covered round shield,
reinforced in critical spots with metal.

Small shields are always less stable, but
landing critical hits after parry is easier.

name: Fire Sniper Crossbow
desc:
Weapon type: Crossbow
Attack type: none

Large crossbow with long distance used by
Carim snipers. Often used with sniper bolts.

But while crossbows are normally easy to
use, the Sniper Crossbow requires dexterity.

name: Fire Spear
desc:
Weapon type: Spear
Attack type: Thrust

Standard spear used commonly by soldiers.
Long reach, and can be used with shield up.
Effective against hard exteriors, and can hit
for high damage at the right moment of an
enemy's swing. But the hit radius is small,
and it is easily blocked by shields.

name: Fire Spider Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Shield of the savage mountain bandits.
Uniquely-shaped with a large black spider
etched upon it.
Has resistance to poison.

name: Fire Spiked Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Shield of the infamous Darkwraith Kirk,
Knight of Thorns. Covered with spikes.

Can be used as a weapon.
Sharp spikes cause heavy bleeding.

name: Fire Straight Sword Hilt
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

The hilt of this lost sword was found
discarded in the Undead Asylum.

Only slightly better than one's bare hands,
and not recommended for extensive use.
Be certain to find a replacement quickly.

name: Fire Sunlight Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Shield of Solaire of Astora, Knight of
Sunlight. Decorated with a holy symbol,
but Solaire illustrated it himself, and it
has no divine powers of its own. As it turns
out, Solaire's incredible prowess is a product
of his own training, and nothing more.

name: Fire Sunlight Str. Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

This standard longsword, belonging to Solaire
of Astora, is of high quality, is well-
forged, and has been kept in good repair.

Easy-to-use and dependable, but unlikely to
live up to its grandiose name.

name: Fire Target Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Small round metal shield.
Four protrusions used to parry attacks.

Small shields are always less stable, but
landing critical hits after parry is easier.
This shield is specialized for parrying.

name: Fire Tower Kite Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Medium metal shield. Decorated with a tower,
the symbol of protection.
A standard, widely-used shield.

name: Fire Tower Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Greatshield
Attack type: Strike

Metal greatshield. Used by Knight Berenike,
known for his heavy armor. This thick plate
of iron is heavily defensive but ultra heavy.
Greatshields are very stable, and deflect
attacks. However, one cannot parry,
and instead bashes with the shield.

name: Fire Uchigatana
desc:
Weapon type: Katana
Attack type: Slash/Thrust

Katana forged in an Eastern land.
Known for its brisk slashing motions.

The Uchigatana cuts beautifully and causes
bleeding, but its blade is easily nicked.

name: Fire Warpick
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Thrust

Hammer with a large beak-shaped pommel.
Originally a pickaxe; redesigned for battle.

This simple but deadly weapon hits heavily
with thrust damage, such that it easily
cracks metal armor.

name: Fire Warrior's Round Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Round wooden shield crafted in Lordran.
Decorated with the ancient Labrys axe.
The giant trees in Lordran are distant
offspring of the great stone archtrees.
This shield inherits their properties, 
and the wood reduces magic damage.

name: Fire Washing Pole
desc:
Weapon type: Katana
Attack type: Slash/Thrust

Katana forged in an Eastern land.
Very unusual specimen with a long blade.

The blade is extremely long,
but as a result, quite easily broken.

name: Fire Whip
desc:
Weapon type: Whip
Attack type: Regular

Leather whip.
Not intended for battle.

Virtually ineffective against armor and tough
scales, but quite formidable against enemies
with exposed skin.

name: Fire Winged Spear
desc:
Weapon type: Spear
Attack type: Thrust

A long-hilted spear with a barbed point.
Long reach, and can be used with shield up.
Effective against hard exteriors, and hits
for high damage at the right moment of an
enemy's swing. But the hit radius is small,
and it is easily blocked by shields.

name: Fire Wooden Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Vertically elongated wooden shield.
Decorated with a white dragon.

Wood shields are lighter than metal shields,
but with lower physical damage reduction,
and reduced shield stability.

name: Fire Zweihander
desc:
Weapon type: Ultra Greatsword
Attack type: Regular

One of the gigantic straight greatswords.

As the name suggests, the Zweihander is held
with two hands, but its wielder must still be
inhumanly strong. It is this great weight
that sends foes flying when hit solidly.

name: Fists
desc: Bare fists

name: Flamberge
desc:
Weapon type: Greatsword
Attack type: Slash

This greatsword with an undulating blade is
the choice weapon of the slithering serpent
men of Sen's Fortress.

This weapon is designed to flay the skin and
causes heavy bleeding.

name: Gargoyle Tail Axe
desc:
Weapon type: Axe
Attack type: Regular

Sliced tail of the gargoyle guarding the
Bell of Awakening in the Undead Church
or patrolling in Anor Londo.

Can be used as a bronze battle axe.
Bends dramatically during large attacks,
owing to its nature as a tail.

name: Gargoyle's Halberd
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Regular

Halberd of the gargoyle guarding the
Bell of Awakening in the Undead Church.

Perfectly standard bronze halberd
without any special power.

name: Gargoyle's Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Bronze shield of the gargoyle guarding the
Bell of Awakening in the Undead Church.
The gargoyle's skin is tough by itself, and
perhaps its shield may have been a prop,
for it is a rare example of a metal shield
that does not reduce physical damage 100%.

name: Ghost Blade
desc:
Weapon type: Dagger
Attack type: Slash/Thrust

The ghosts of New Londo clutch this wickedly
sharp dagger with their bony hands and make
mincemeat of the living.

One of the cursed weapons which can inflict
damage upon ghosts.

name: Giant Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Greatshield
Attack type: Strike

Greatshield made of bronze and marcasite.
Used by giant sentinels of Anor Londo.
Marcasite, or white iron, is effective
against non-physical damage, but as the
shield is designed for the giant sentinels,
its weight is unbearable.

name: Giant's Halberd
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

Large halberd made of old brass, used by
the giant sentinels of Anor Londo.

Brass contains traces of lightning,
but as the halberd is designed for the giant
sentinels, its weight is unbearable.

name: Golem Axe
desc:
Weapon type: Axe
Attack type: Regular

An axe born from the soul of the Iron Golem,
guardian of Sen's Fortress who repelled
countless heroes who sought Anor Londo.
Its powerful one-handed attack imitates the
golem's blade of wind, but the heavy iron
blade makes it quite unwieldy.

name: Grant
desc:
Weapon type: Great Hammer
Attack type: Strike

A legendary weapon of the Way of White,
granted to an Undead paladin long ago.

This mass of iron can only be lifted by those
with inhuman strength, but it is blessed,
and very effective against agents of Dark.

name: Grass Crest Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Old medium metal shield of unknown origin.
The grass crest is lightly imbued with magic,
which slightly speeds stamina recovery.

name: Gravelord Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Greatsword
Attack type: Slash/Thrust

Sword wielded only by servants of
Gravelord Nito, the first of the dead.
Crafted from the bones of the fallen.

The miasma of death exudes from the sword,
a veritable toxin to any living being.

name: Great Club
desc:
Weapon type: Great Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Giant tree branch serves as a wooden club.
Smashes enemies from upside the head.

The leaping attack is a trademark of clubs,
and this giant club is no exception.

name: Great Lord Greatsword
desc:
Weapon type: Greatsword
Attack type: Regular

Greatsword born from the soul of Gwyn,
Lord of Cinder. As bearer of the ultimate
soul, Gwyn wielded the bolts of the sun,
but before linking the fire, divided that
power amongst his children, and set off with
only this greatsword as his companion.

name: Great Scythe
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Slash

Weapon with a long curved blade. Converted
from a wheat-harvesting tool.

The magnificent sharp curved blade
instills fear in opponents. Perhaps it is
their survival instinct at work.

name: Greataxe
desc:
Weapon type: Greataxe
Attack type: Regular

This greataxe is a veritable mass of iron.
Its weight sends foes flying, but makes it
difficult to handle without inhuman strength.

Any miss makes one very vulnerable, as each
swing requires the full force of the body.

name: Greatshield of Artorias
desc:
Weapon type: Greatshield
Attack type: Strike

Shield born from the soul of the great grey
wolf Sif, guardian of the grave of the
Abysswalker Knight Artorias.
Boasts consistent defense and divine
protection against various status effects.

name: Greatsword
desc:
Weapon type: Ultra Greatsword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

One of the gigantic straight greatswords.

Very few have what it takes to wield this
incredibly heavy, damage-dealing monster.
A favorite of the Knights Berenike, known for
their heavy armor, and Black Iron Tarkus.

name: Greatsword of Artorias
desc:
Weapon type: Greatsword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

Sword born from the soul of the great grey
wolf Sif, guardian of the grave of the
Abysswalker Knight Artorias.

Sir Artorias hunted the Darkwraiths, and his
sword strikes harder against dark servants.

name: Halberd
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

Long-hilted weapon mixing spear and axe is
difficult to handle, requiring both strength
and dexterity. The Halberd has two elementary
attacks: spear-like thrusting and large
sweeping swings. However, one false swing
and the wielder is left wide open.

name: Hammer of Vamos
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Metal hammer of Vamos, a skeleton blacksmith
deep within the Catacombs who rarely speaks.

Can be used as a strike weapon, but better
left in the hands of its talented owner.

name: Hand Axe
desc:
Weapon type: Axe
Attack type: Regular

Small hand axe. Appears identical to a
lumberjack's tool, but has an ideal weight
and strength, and is easy to handle.
One wrong swing leaves the wielder wide
open, so timing and proximity to the enemy
must be judged carefully.

name: Havel's Greatshield
desc:
Weapon type: Greatshield
Attack type: Strike

Greatshield of the legendary Havel the Rock.
Cut straight from a great slab of stone.
This greatshield is imbued with the magic
of Havel, provides strong defense, and is
incredibly heavy. A true divine heirloom
on par with the Dragon Tooth.

name: Heater Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Small metal shield.
A standard, widely-used shield.

This shield is easy to use, and is one of
the smallest shields that offers
100% physical damage reduction.

name: Heavy Crossbow
desc:
Weapon type: Crossbow
Attack type: none

Powerful large crossbow.
While bows require both hands, a crossbow is
held in one, but arming each bolt takes time.

Equip bolts to use.
Press <?platmsg@10003?>/<?platmsg@10004?> to change type of bolt.

name: Hollow Soldier Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Metal shield wielded by Hollow soldiers.
Heavily rusted but sturdy, providing a
strong defense.

name: Iaito
desc:
Weapon type: Katana
Attack type: Slash

Katana forged in an Eastern land.
The Katana is drawn from the scabbard at
lightning speed, using an Iaijutsu technique.

Iaijutsu allows the wielder to charge
forward to swiftly cut down distant foes.

name: Iron Round Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Thick iron shield of Shiva of the East.
Heaviest of the standard shields.
Deflects enemy attacks. A famous specimen
from Shiva's collection, but none who have
faced it have lived to tell the tale.

name: Ivory Talisman
desc:
Weapon type: Talisman
Attack type: Strike

Medium for casting miracles of the Gods.
Ivory Talismans are granted only to female
clerics, and their value is affected
dramatically by their owner's faith.

name: Izalith Catalyst
desc:
Weapon type: Catalyst
Attack type: Strike

Catalyst of the Witch of Izalith of long ago,
when her daughters were still flame witches,
before they were engulfed by the Chaos Flame.
Before the birth of pyromancy, their wands
were mediums for sorcery, but knowledge of
this flame sorcery has long since vanished.

name: Jagged Ghost Blade
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Sword
Attack type: Slash/Thrust

Jagged blade wielded by New Londo ghosts.
Violent thrust attack.

One of the cursed weapons.
Inflicts damage to ghosts.

name: Knight Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

This medium metal shield is elegantly
carved and painted.
Although it is thought to have been used by
ancient knights of the nobility, its defense
capabilities are similar to other shields.

name: Large Club
desc:
Weapon type: Great Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Large wooden club.

The giant Undead of Blighttown wield these
clubs, which became poisonous from the
influence of their surroundings.

name: Large Leather Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Large, leather-covered round shield.
Choice shield for hunters.

Wood shields are lighter than metal shields,
but with lower physical damage reduction,
and reduced shield stability.

name: Leather Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Round leather-covered shield.
A standard, widely-used shield.

Small shields are always less stable, but
landing critical hits after parry is easier.

name: Lifehunt Scythe
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Slash

Scythe born from the soul of Priscilla, the
stark white crossbreed trapped inside the
Painted World of Ariamis.
Even the Gods feared Priscilla's lifehunt
ability, and in the hands of a mortal, its
power will turn upon its wielder.

name: Light Crossbow
desc:
Weapon type: Crossbow
Attack type: none

Standard crossbow issued to soldiers.
While bows require both hands, a crossbow is
held in one, but arming each bolt takes time.

Equip bolts to use.
Press <?platmsg@10003?>/<?platmsg@10004?> to change type of bolt.

name: Lightning Avelyn
desc:
Weapon type: Crossbow
Attack type: none

Repeating crossbow cherished by the weapon
craftsman Eidas. Its elaborate design makes
it closer to a work of art than a weapon.
Intricate mechanism makes heavy damage
possible through triple-shot firing of bolts,
but in fact each bolt inflicts less damage.

name: Lightning Balder Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Shield of the knights of the ancient kingdom
of Balder. Tweaked for improved stability.
Balder was the home of Knight King Rendal,
but the kingdom was reduced to ruins after
a widespread outbreak of Undead.

name: Lightning Balder Side Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

The knights of the ancient kingdom of Balder
wielded these rock-solid, long swords which
are excellent for thrust attacks.
Balder was the home of Knight King Rendal,
but the kingdom was reduced to ruins after
a widespread outbreak of Undead.

name: Lightning Bastard Sword
desc:
Weapon type: Greatsword
Attack type: Regular

This standard greatsword is normally wielded
with two hands due to its great weight.

Usually swung in large arcs and effective
against multiple foes. Far from ideal when
fighting in tight quarters.

name: Lightning Battle Axe
desc:
Weapon type: Axe
Attack type: Regular

Standard battle axe. Inflicts regular damage,
making it effective in various situations.
Powerful attack due to its weight, but one
wrong swing leaves the wielder wide open,
so timing and proximity to the enemy must
be judged carefully.

name: Lightning Blacksmith Hammer
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Metal hammer of Andre of Astora,
blacksmith at the Old Church.

Can be used as a strike weapon, but better
left in the hands of its talented owner.

name: Lightning Bloodshield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

The bloodshield spoken of in the lost
legends. The red of blood is slightly
enchanted, and boosts various resistances.

name: Lightning Bonewheel Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Greatshield
Attack type: Strike

Giant wooden wheel encircled by spikes.
Half-melded to a strange skeleton.

Can be used as a greatshield, only for the
great gaps. But at least the spikes turn into
weapons with a good spin. Strange indeed!

name: Lightning Broadsword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular

The wide blade of this straight sword
emphasizes slicing and has no thrust attack.

The horizontal sweeping motion makes this
sword effective against multiple enemies.

name: Lightning Buckler
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Very small round metal shield.
Parry attacks with large center protrusion.

Small shields are always less stable, but
landing critical hits after parry is easier.
This shield is specialized for parrying.

name: Lightning Butcher Knife
desc:
Weapon type: Axe
Attack type: Regular

Giant butcher knife wielded by the Undead
man-eating cook lurking in the Depths.
More a tool for subduing and preparing live
catches than an actual weapon. Those who
have faced this deadly blade have a deeper
sense of how helpless prey must feel.

name: Lightning Caestus
desc:
Weapon type: Fists
Attack type: Strike

The weapon augments one's bare hands
with thick, studded leather.

The Caestus has a short reach, but quick
cool down. Amount of damage inflicted is
dependent on its wearer's strength.

name: Lightning Claw
desc:
Weapon type: Fists
Attack type: Slash

A weapon formed by three sharp claws.

Attacks cause bleeding, and the wounds
inflicted are not easily mended. Preferred
weapon of the spooks of an Eastern land.

name: Lightning Claymore
desc:
Weapon type: Greatsword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

This larger type of greatsword is normally
wielded with two hands due to its weight.

This highly flexible greatsword can be used
to attack in swings or thrusts.

name: Lightning Club
desc:
Weapon type: Hammer
Attack type: Strike

A simple wooden club.
This simple bladeless strike weapon is
effective against most foes, is easily
handled, and can break the guard of a shield.
However, a single miss makes one wide open,
so timing and proximities are crucial.

name: Lightning Composite Bow
desc:
Weapon type: Bow
Attack type: none

Composite bow emphasizing power.
Requires more strength than standard bows.

However, its range is shorter, making it
unfit for sniping.

name: Lightning Dagger
desc:
Weapon type: Dagger
Attack type: Slash/Thrust

This standard small dagger has only a modest
attack but can be jabbed in rapid succession,
and is effective in critical hits such as
after a parry or when stabbing in the back.
With both slash and thrust attacks, this
dagger is useful in various situations.

name: Lightning Darksword
desc:
Weapon type: Straight Sword
Attack type: Regular

The sword of the knights of the Four Kings of
New Londo. Its blade is wide and thick, and
it is wielded in an unusual manner.
When the Four Kings were seduced by evil,
their knights became Darkwraiths, servants
of the Dark who wielded these darkswords.

name: Lightning Demon's Greataxe
desc:
Weapon type: Greataxe
Attack type: Regular

Carved from the bones of fellow demons.
Wielded by the lesser Taurus demons.

This axe is imbued with no special power,
but can merrily beat foes to a pulp,
providing you have the strength to wield it.

name: Lightning Eagle Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Greatshield
Attack type: Strike

Greatshield with an eagle design. Lightest
and easiest greatshield to handle.

Greatshields are very stable, and deflect
attacks. But one cannot parry, and instead
bashes with the shield.

name: Lightning East-West Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Wooden shield.
Decorated with the ancient symbol of
a double-headed eagle, painted yellow.

Wood shields are lighter than metal shields,
but with lower physical damage reduction,
and reduced shield stability.

name: Lightning Effigy Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Small Shield
Attack type: Strike

Frightful occult shield. Defends against
divine weapons and lightning.

In an ill-fated plot to destroy the very
gods, the followers of the occult once
attempted to steal the power of
Gravelord Nito, the first of the dead.

name: Lightning Estoc
desc:
Weapon type: Thrusting Sword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

The largest of the thrusting swords.
Can pierce an armored knight in one thrust.

The blade is also sharp,
allowing slicing as well.

name: Lightning Falchion
desc:
Weapon type: Curved Sword
Attack type: Slash

Small curved sword. Each hit inflicts little
damage, but fluid chain attacks are deadly.

The falchion's sharp slashing attacks are
effective against cloth and flesh, but not
against metal armor or tough scales.

name: Lightning Flamberge
desc:
Weapon type: Greatsword
Attack type: Slash

This greatsword with an undulating blade is
the choice weapon of the slithering serpent
men of Sen's Fortress.

This weapon is designed to flay the skin and
causes heavy bleeding.

name: Lightning Gargoyle Tail Axe
desc:
Weapon type: Axe
Attack type: Regular

Sliced tail of the gargoyle guarding the
Bell of Awakening in the Undead Church.

Can be used as a bronze battle axe.
Bends dramatically during large attacks,
owing to its nature as a tail.

name: Lightning Gargoyle's Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Shield
Attack type: Strike

Bronze shield of the gargoyle guarding the
Bell of Awakening in the Undead Church.
The gargoyle's skin is tough by itself, and
perhaps its shield may have been a prop,
for it is a rare example of a metal shield
that does not reduce physical damage 100%.

name: Lightning Giant Shield
desc:
Weapon type: Greatshield
Attack type: Strike

Greatshield made of bronze and marcasite.
Used by giant sentinels of Anor Londo.
Marcasite, or white iron, is effective
against non-physical damage, but as the
shield is designed for the giant sentinels,
its weight is unbearable.

name: Lightning Great Club
desc:
Weapon type: Great Hammer
Attack type: Strike

Giant tree branch serves as a wooden club.
Smashes enemies from upside the head.

The leaping attack is a trademark of clubs,
and this giant club is no exception.

name: Lightning Great Scythe
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Slash

Weapon with a long curved blade. Converted
from a wheat-harvesting tool.

The magnificent sharp curved blade
instills fear in opponents. Perhaps it is
their survival instinct at work.

name: Lightning Greataxe
desc:
Weapon type: Greataxe
Attack type: Regular

This greataxe is a veritable mass of iron.
Its weight sends foes flying, but makes it
difficult to handle without inhuman strength.

Any miss makes one very vulnerable, as each
swing requires the full force of the body.

name: Lightning Greatsword
desc:
Weapon type: Ultra Greatsword
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

One of the gigantic straight greatswords.

Very few have what it takes to wield this
incredibly heavy, damage-dealing monster.
A favorite of the Knights Berenike, known for
their heavy armor, and Black Iron Tarkus.

name: Lightning Halberd
desc:
Weapon type: Halberd
Attack type: Regular/Thrust

Long-hilted weapon mixing spear and axe is
difficult to handle, requiring both strength
and dexterity. The Halberd has two elementary
attacks: spear-like thrusting and large
sweeping swings. However, one false swing
and the wielder is left wide open.

name: Lightning Hand Axe
desc:
Weapon type: Axe
Attack type: Regular
